  6804                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6805                                  
  6806                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6807                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6808                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  6809                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  6810                                  
  6811                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6812                                  ;
  6813                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6814                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6815                                  ;
  6816                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6817                                  ;
  6818                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6819                                  ;   initialize it.
  6820                                  ;
  6821                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6822                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  6823                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  6824                                  ;
  6825                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  6826                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  6827                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  6828                                  ;
  6829                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  6830                                  ;   save coding.
  6831                                  ;
  6832                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  6833                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  6834                                  ;
  6835                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  6836                                  ;
  6837                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  6838                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  6839                                  ;
  6840                                  ; called modules:
  6841                                  ;		  getboot
  6842                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  6843                                  ;
  6844                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  6845                                  ;
  6846                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  6847                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  6848                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6849                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  6850                                  ;
  6851                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6852                                  
  6853                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6854                                  domini:	
  6855 00001F72 8A36[FF15]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  6856                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6857 00001F76 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  6858                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  6859 00001F78 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  6860 00001F7A B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  6861                                  domini_loop:				
  6862 00001F7C 52                      		push	dx
  6863 00001F7D 8816[FE15]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  6864 00001F81 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6865 00001F83 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6866                                  					; DL = drive number
  6867                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6868                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6869                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6870                                  		
  6871                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  6872                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  6873                                  		;inc	dh
  6874                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  6875                                  		;mov	al, dh
  6876 00001F85 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  6877 00001F87 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  6878 00001F89 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  6879 00001F8A A3[0416]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  6880                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  6881                                  		;mov	al, cl
  6882                                  		; 08/08/2023
  6883 00001F8D 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  6884 00001F8F 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  6885 00001F92 A3[0616]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  6886 00001F95 06                      		push	es
  6887 00001F96 8A16[FE15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6888 00001F9A E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  6889                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  6890 00001F9D 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  6891 00001F9F E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  6892                                  domininext:				
  6893 00001FA2 07                      		pop	es
  6894 00001FA3 5A                      		pop	dx
  6895 00001FA4 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  6896 00001FA6 FECE                    		dec	dh
  6897 00001FA8 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  6898                                  dominiret:				
  6899 00001FAA C3                      		retn
  6900                                  
  6901                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6902                                  
  6903                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6904                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6905                                  
  6906                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  6907                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  6908                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  6909                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  6910                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  6911                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  6912                                  ;
  6913                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  6914                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  6915                                  
  6916                                  find_mini_partition:	
  6917 00001FAB 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  6918                                  fmpnext:				
  6919 00001FAF 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  6920 00001FB3 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  6921 00001FB5 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6922 00001FB8 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6923 00001FBC 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  6924                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  6925                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6926                                  fmpnextfound:
  6927 00001FBE C3                      		retn
  6928                                  
  6929                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  6930                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  6931                                  ;fmpret:
  6932                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  6933                                  
  6934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6935                                  
  6936                                  		; 19/10/2022
  6937                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  6938 00001FBF E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  6939 00001FC2 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  6940 00001FC4 8B3E[0216]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  6941 00001FC8 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  6942                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6943 00001FCD 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  6944                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6945                                  					; fNon_Removable
  6946 00001FD1 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6947                                  					; ffHardFile
  6948 00001FD5 C606[8815]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  6949 00001FDA A1[0416]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  6950 00001FDD 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6951 00001FE0 A1[0616]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  6952 00001FE3 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6953 00001FE6 A0[FE15]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6954 00001FE9 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6955                                  					; set physical number
  6956 00001FEC A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  6957 00001FEF 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6958                                  					; set logical number
  6959 00001FF2 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  6960 00001FF7 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  6961 00001FF9 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  6962                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  6963 00001FFE 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  6964                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  6965                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  6966 00002000 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  6967 00002003 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  6968 00002007 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  6969 0000200A D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6970 0000200C D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  6971 0000200E 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  6972 00002012 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  6973                                  					; set hidden trks
  6974 00002015 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  6975 00002019 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  6976 0000201D 8A16[FE15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  6977 00002021 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  6978 00002024 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6979 00002027 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6980                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6981                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6982                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6983 00002029 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  6984 0000202B BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6985                                  
  6986                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  6987                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  6988 0000202E 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  6989 00002034 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  6990                                  
  6991                                  		; 13/08/2023
  6992                                  		;push	es
  6993 00002036 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  6994                                  					; bx value saved.
  6995                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  6996 00002039 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  6997 0000203B E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  6998                                  fmpnextchain:
  6999 0000203E E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7000                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7002                                  
  7003                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7004                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7005                                  		;retn
  7006                                  
  7007                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7008                                  
  7009                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7010                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7011                                  
  7012                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7013                                  	
  7014 00002041 57                      		push	di
  7015 00002042 53                      		push	bx
  7016                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7017                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7018                                  		;push	ds
  7019 00002043 06                      		push	es
  7020                                  setmini_1:				
  7021 00002044 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7022 00002048 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7023 0000204A 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7024 0000204E 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7025 00002050 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7026 00002054 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7027 00002056 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7028 00002059 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7029 0000205D 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7030 0000205F F9                      		stc
  7031 00002060 07                      		pop	es
  7032                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7033                                  		;pop	ds
  7034 00002061 5B                      		pop	bx
  7035 00002062 5F                      		pop	di
  7036 00002063 C3                      		retn
  7037                                  
  7038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7039                                  setmini_2:
  7040 00002064 E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7041                                  
  7042                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7043                                  
  7044                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7045                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7046                                  ;
  7047                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7048                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7049                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7050                                  ;
  7051                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7052                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7053                                  ;			trash ax
  7054                                  
  7055                                  dmax_check:
  7056 00002067 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7057 0000206C 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; returns with carry if okay
  7058 0000206E 06                      		push	es
  7059                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7060 0000206F B82E04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7061 00002072 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7062                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7063 00002074 26C606[8103]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7064                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7065                                  					; set message flag
  7066                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7067 0000207A 07                      		pop	es
  7068                                  
  7069                                  		;;push	es
  7070                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7071                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7072                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7073                                  					; set message flag
  7074                                  		;;pop	es
  7075                                  		;
  7076                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7077                                  dmax_ok:
  7078 0000207B C3                      		retn
  7079                                  
  7080                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7081                                  
  7082                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7083                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7084                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7085                                  ;								 
  7086                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7087                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7088                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7089                                  
  7090                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7091 0000207C 56                      		push	si
  7092 0000207D 53                      		push	bx
  7093 0000207E 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7094                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7095 00002082 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7096 00002085 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so
  7097                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7098 00002087 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7099 00002089 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7101                                  
  7102                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7103                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7104 0000208B 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7105                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7106 0000208D 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7107                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7108 00002090 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7109                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7110 00002094 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7111                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7112                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7113 00002097 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7114 0000209A 8B36[0016]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7115 0000209E 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7116 000020A0 8306[0016]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7117 000020A5 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7118 000020A9 8306[0216]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7119 000020AE 5B                      		pop	bx
  7120 000020AF 5E                      		pop	si
  7121 000020B0 C3                      		retn
  7122                                  
  7123                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7124                                  
  7125                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7126                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7127                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7128                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7129                                  
  7130                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7131 000020B1 50                      		push	ax
  7132 000020B2 51                      		push	cx
  7133 000020B3 52                      		push	dx
  7134 000020B4 55                      		push	bp
  7135 000020B5 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7136                                  loop_clock:				
  7137 000020B7 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7138 000020B9 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7139 000020BB B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7140 000020BD CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7141                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7142                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7143                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7144 000020BF 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7145 000020C2 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7146 000020C4 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7147 000020C7 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7148 000020C9 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7149 000020CC 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was at zero setting.
  7150 000020CE 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7151 000020CF B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7152                                  delay:					
  7153 000020D2 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7154 000020D4 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7155                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7156                                  
  7157                                  clock_present:				
  7158 000020D6 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7159 000020DC E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7160                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7161                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7162 000020DF 56                      		push	si
  7163 000020E0 E813F3                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7164 000020E3 FA                      		cli
  7165                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7166 000020E4 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7167 000020E8 FB                      		sti
  7168 000020E9 5E                      		pop	si
  7169                                  
  7170                                  no_readdate:				
  7171 000020EA 5D                      		pop	bp
  7172 000020EB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7173 000020EC 59                      		pop	cx
  7174 000020ED 58                      		pop	ax
  7175 000020EE C3                      		retn
  7176                                  
  7177                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7178                                  
  7179                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7180                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7181                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7182                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7183                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7184                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7185                                  ;
  7186                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7187                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7188                                  ;
  7189                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7190                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7191                                  ;
  7192                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7193                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7194                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7195                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7196                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7197                                  ;
  7198                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7199                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7200                                  
  7201                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  7202                                  
  7203                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7204                                  
  7205                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7206                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7207                                  			
  7208 000020EF 50                      		push	ax
  7209 000020F0 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7210 000020F6 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7211 000020F8 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7212                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7213 000020FE 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  7214 00002100 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7215                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7216 00002106 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  7217                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  7218                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7219                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  7220                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  7221                                  cmosck4:				
  7222 00002108 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7223                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7224 0000210A B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7225                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  7226 0000210C E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7227 0000210F B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7228                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7229 00002111 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7230 00002114 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7231                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7232 00002116 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7233 00002118 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7234                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7235 0000211A E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7236                                  cmosck9:				
  7237 0000211D 58                      		pop	ax
  7238 0000211E C3                      		retn
  7239                                  
  7240                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7241                                  
  7242                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7243                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7244                                  ;									       :
  7245                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7246                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7247                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7248                                  ;									       :
  7249                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7250                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7251                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7252                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7253                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7254                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7255                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7256                                  
  7257                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7258 0000211F 9C                      		pushf
  7259 00002120 FA                      		cli
  7260 00002121 53                      		push	bx
  7261 00002122 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  7262 00002123 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7263 00002125 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7264                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7265 00002127 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  7266 00002128 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7267 0000212A 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7268 0000212C 58                      		pop	ax
  7269 0000212D 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7270 0000212F 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7271 00002131 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7272                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7273 00002133 90                      		nop
  7274 00002134 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7275 00002136 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7276 00002138 5B                      		pop	bx
  7277 00002139 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7278 0000213A E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7279 0000213D C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7280                                  
  7281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7282                                  
  7283                                  cmos_popf:				
  7284 0000213E CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7285                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7286                                  
  7287                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7288                                  
  7289                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7290                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7291                                  ;									       :
  7292                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7293                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7294                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7295                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7296                                  ;									       :
  7297                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7298                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7299                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7300                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7301                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7302                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7303                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7304                                  
  7305                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  7306 0000213F 9C                      		pushf			;
  7307 00002140 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7308 00002141 FA                      		cli
  7309 00002142 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7310 00002143 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7311 00002145 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7312                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7313 00002147 90                      		nop
  7314 00002148 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7315 0000214A E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7316 0000214C 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7317 0000214D 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7318 0000214F 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7319 00002151 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7320                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7321 00002153 90                      		nop
  7322 00002154 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7323 00002156 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7324 00002157 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7325 00002158 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7326 0000215B C3                      		retn
  7327                                  
  7328                                  ; 21/12/2022
  7329                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7330                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7331                                  %if 0
  7332                                  
  7333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7334                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7335                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7336                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7338                                  
  7339                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7340                                  ;
  7341                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7342                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7343                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7344                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7345                                  
  7346                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7347                                  
  7348                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7349                                  ;
  7350                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7351                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7352                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7353                                  
  7354                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7355                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7356                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7357                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7358                                  
  7359                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7360                                  getclus:				
  7361                                  		push	cx
  7362                                  		push	di
  7363                                  		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7364                                  		mov	ax, bx
  7365                                  		dec	ax
  7366                                  		dec	ax
  7367                                  		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7368                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7369                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7370                                  		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7371                                  		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7372                                  unpack:					
  7373                                  		push	ds
  7374                                  		push	ax
  7375                                  		push	bx
  7376                                  		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7377                                  		mov	ds, si
  7378                                  		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7379                                  		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7380                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7381                                  		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7382                                  		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7383                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7384                                  		add	si, bx		;
  7385                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7386                                  		push	dx
  7387                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7388                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7389                                  		pop	dx
  7390                                  		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7391                                  		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7392                                  		; 25/06/2023	
  7393                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7394                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7395                                  		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7396                                  		push	dx
  7397                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7398                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7399                                  		pop	dx
  7400                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7401                                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7402                                  		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7403                                  		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7404                                  even_odd:				
  7405                                  		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7406                                  		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7407                                  		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7408                                  		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7409                                  		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7410                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7411                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7412                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7413                                  		shr	ax, 1
  7414                                  havclus:				
  7415                                  		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7416                                  		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7417                                  		jmp	short unpackx
  7418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7419                                  
  7420                                  unpack16:				
  7421                                  		push	dx
  7422                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7423                                  		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7424                                  		adc	dx, 0
  7425                                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7426                                  		pop	dx
  7427                                  		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7428                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7429                                  unpackx:				
  7430                                  		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7431                                  		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7432                                  		pop	ds
  7433                                  		sub	si, bx
  7434                                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7435                                  		jnz	short getcl2
  7436                                  		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7437                                  		jmp	short unpack
  7438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7439                                  
  7440                                  getcl2:					
  7441                                  		push	bx
  7442                                  		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7443                                  		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7444                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7445                                  		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7446                                  		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7447                                  		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7448                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7449                                  		push	ds
  7450                                  		push	cs
  7451                                  		pop	ds
  7452                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7453                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7454                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7455                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7456                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7457                                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7458                                  		pop	ds
  7459                                  		pop	bx
  7460                                  		pop	di
  7461                                  		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7462                                  		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7463                                  		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7464                                  		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7465                                  		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7466                                  		retn
  7467                                  
  7468                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7469                                  
  7470                                  
  7471                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7472                                  ;
  7473                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7474                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7475                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7476                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7477                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7478                                  ;
  7479                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7480                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7481                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7482                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7483                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7484                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7485                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7486                                  
  7487                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7488                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7489                                  		push	ax
  7490                                  		push	cx
  7491                                  		push	di
  7492                                  		push	si
  7493                                  		push	es
  7494                                  		push	ds
  7495                                  		mov	ax, si
  7496                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7497                                  		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7498                                  		nop
  7499                                  
  7500                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7501                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7502                                  
  7503                                  		push	es
  7504                                  		push	ds
  7505                                  		push	di
  7506                                  		push	ax
  7507                                  		push	cs
  7508                                  		pop	ds
  7509                                  
  7510                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7511                                  		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7512                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7513                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7514                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7515                                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7516                                  		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7517                                  		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7518                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7519                                  		pop	di
  7520                                  		pop	ds
  7521                                  		pop	es
  7522                                  		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7523                                  		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7524                                  		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7525                                  					; sector number
  7526                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7527                                  		push	dx
  7528                                  		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7529                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7530                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7531                                  		mov	dx, ax
  7532                                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7533                                  		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7534                                  		push	ds
  7535                                  		pop	es
  7536                                  		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7537                                  		push	ds
  7538                                  		push	cs
  7539                                  		pop	ds
  7540                                  		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7541                                  		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7542                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7543                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7544                                  		call	call_bios_code
  7545                                  		pop	ds
  7546                                  		pop	dx
  7547                                  		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7548                                  
  7549                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7550                                  		dec	cx		; 511
  7551                                  		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7552                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7553                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7554                                  		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7555                                  		pop	ds
  7556                                  		pop	es
  7557                                  		pop	si
  7558                                  		pop	di
  7559                                  		pop	cx
  7560                                  		pop	ax
  7561                                  		retn
  7562                                  
  7563                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7564                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7565                                  
  7566                                  %endif
  7567                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7569                                  
  7570                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7571                                  		;db 0
  7572

  7574                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7575                                  
  7576                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7577 0000215C 00<rep 4h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7578                                  %endif
  7579

  7581

  7583                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7584                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7585

  7599                                  
  7600                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7601

  7607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7608                                  
  7609                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7610 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7611 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7612                                  
  7613                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7614                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7615                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7616                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7617

  7621                                  
  7622                                  ;************************************************************************
  7623                                  ;*									*
  7624                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7625                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7626                                  ;*									*
  7627                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7628                                  ;*									*
  7629                                  ;************************************************************************
  7630                                  
  7631                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7632                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  7633                                  
  7634                                  _seg_reinit:
  7635 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7636                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7637                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7638 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7639                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7640                                  		; 10/08/2023
  7641 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  7642                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  7643 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7644 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7645 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7646 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7647                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  7648                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  7649                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  7650 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  7651 00000046 CB                      		retf
  7652                                  
  7653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7654                                  
  7655                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7656                                  
  7657                                  ;************************************************************************
  7658                                  ;*									*
  7659                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7660                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7661                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7662                                  ;*									*
  7663                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7664                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7665                                  ;*									*
  7666                                  ;************************************************************************
  7667                                  
  7668                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7669 00000047 56                      		push	si
  7670 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  7671 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  7672 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  7673 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  7674 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  7675 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  7676 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  7677 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  7678 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7679 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7680                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7681                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7682 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7683 0000005A 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7684 0000005D A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7685 00000060 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7686 00000064 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7687 00000066 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7688 0000006A 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7689 0000006E 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7690 00000072 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7691 00000076 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7692                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7693 0000007A 81FE[3B05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7694                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7695                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7696 0000007E 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7697                                  
  7698                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7699                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7700                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7701                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7702                                  ;
  7703                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7704                                  ;
  7705                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7706                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7707                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7708                                  ;
  7709                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7710                                  
  7711                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7712 00000080 C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7713 00000086 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7714 00000089 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7715 0000008B 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7716                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7717                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7718 0000008F 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7719 00000093 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7720                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7721                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7722 00000097 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7723 00000098 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7724 0000009C 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7725 0000009F 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7726 000000A1 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7727 000000A2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7728 000000A4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7729 000000A6 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7730 000000A7 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7731 000000AB FC                      		cld
  7732                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7733 000000AC 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7734                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7735 000000B0 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7736 000000B2 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7737                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7738                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7739                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7740                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7741 000000B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7742                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7743 000000B9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7744 000000BD 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7745                                  					; mark operation complete
  7746 000000C0 5B                      		pop	bx
  7747 000000C1 07                      		pop	es
  7748 000000C2 1F                      		pop	ds
  7749 000000C3 5D                      		pop	bp
  7750 000000C4 5F                      		pop	di
  7751 000000C5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7752 000000C6 59                      		pop	cx
  7753 000000C7 58                      		pop	ax
  7754 000000C8 5E                      		pop	si
  7755 000000C9 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7756                                  	
  7757                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7759                                  bc_retf:
  7760 000000CC CB                      		retf
  7761                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7762                                  
  7763                                  command_error:				
  7764 000000CD E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7765 000000D0 EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7766                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7767                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7768                                  
  7769                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7770                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7771                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7772                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7773                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7774                                  ; high.
  7775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7776                                  
  7777                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7778                                  
  7779                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7780                                  
  7781 000000D2 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7782                                  
  7783 000000D4 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7784                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7785                                  		
  7786                                  
  7787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7788                                  
  7789                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7790                                  
  7791                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7792 000000D9 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7793                                  					; unknown command error
  7794                                  
  7795                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7796                                  
  7797                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7798                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7799                                  
  7800                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7801                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7802                                  
  7803                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7804                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7805                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7806 000000DB C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7807 000000DF 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7808                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7809 000000E3 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7810 000000E5 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7811 000000E6 C3                      		retn
  7812                                  
  7813                                  ; 15/10/2022

  7824                                  
  7825                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7826                                  
  7827                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7828                                  
  7829                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7830                                  
  7831                                  ;************************************************************************
  7832                                  ;*									*
  7833                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7834                                  ;*									*
  7835                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7836                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7837                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7838                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7839                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7840                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7841                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7842                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7843                                  ;*									*
  7844                                  ;************************************************************************
  7845                                  
  7846                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7847                                  		;db 0
  7848                                  
  7849                                  		; 13/12/202
  7850 000000E7 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7851                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7852 000000E8 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7853                                  					; 00 init
  7854 000000EA [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7855 000000EC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7856 000000EE [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7857                                  					; 03
  7858 000000F0 [5F01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7859                                  					; 04
  7860 000000F2 [A201]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7861                                  					; 05
  7862 000000F4 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7863 000000F6 [0B02]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7864                                  					; 07
  7865 000000F8 [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7866                                  					; 08
  7867 000000FA [FF01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7868 000000FC [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7869                                  con_table_end:
  7870 000000FE 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7871                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7872 000000FF [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7873 00000101 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7874 00000103 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7875 00000105 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7876 00000107 [1C02]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7877                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7878 00000109 [CA01]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7879                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7880 0000010B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7881 0000010D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7882 0000010F [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7883 00000111 [2102]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7884 00000113 [5202]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7885 00000115 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7886 00000117 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7887 00000119 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7888 0000011B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  7889 0000011D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  7890 0000011F [8C02]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  7891 00000121 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  7892 00000123 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  7893 00000125 [BA02]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  7894 00000127 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  7895 00000129 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  7896 0000012B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  7897 0000012D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  7898 0000012F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  7899 00000131 [EF02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  7900                                  prn_table_end:
  7901 00000133 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  7902                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  7903 00000134 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  7904 00000136 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7905 00000138 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7906 0000013A [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  7907 0000013C [0A03]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  7908 0000013E [2F03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  7909 00000140 [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7910 00000142 [6503]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  7911 00000144 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  7912 00000146 [6C03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  7913 00000148 [4F03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  7914                                  aux_table_end:
  7915 0000014A 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  7916                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  7917 0000014B [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  7918 0000014D [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7919 0000014F [FD01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7920 00000151 [D900]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
