  7926 0000015D [D203]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  7927                                  tim_table_end:
  7928                                  
  7929                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7930                                  
  7931                                  ;************************************************************************
  7932                                  ;*									*
  7933                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  7934                                  ;*									*
  7935                                  ;************************************************************************
  7936                                  
  7937                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  7938                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  7939 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  7940                                  con_loop:				
  7941 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  7942 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  7943 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  7944                                  con_exit:				
  7945 00000167 F8                      		clc
  7946 00000168 C3                      		retn
  7947                                  
  7948                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7949                                  
  7950                                  ;************************************************************************
  7951                                  ;*									*
  7952                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  7953                                  ;*									*
  7954                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  7955                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  7956                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  7957                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  7958                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  7959                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  7960                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  7961                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  7962                                  ;*									*
  7963                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  7964                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  7965                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  7966                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  7967                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  7968                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  7969                                  ;*									*
  7970                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  7971                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  7972                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  7973                                  ;*									*
  7974                                  ;************************************************************************
  7975                                  
  7976                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7977                                  chrin:		
  7978 00000169 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  7979 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  7980 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  7981 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  7982 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  7983 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  7984 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  7985 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  7986 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  7987 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  7988 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  7989 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  7990                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7991                                  
  7992                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  7993                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  7994                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  7995                                  ;	 goto keyret
  7996                                  ;      else
  7997                                  ;	 set al to zero
  7998                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  7999                                  ;      endif
  8000                                  ;    endif
  8001                                  ;  endif
  8002                                  
  8003                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8004 00000186 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8005 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8006 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8007 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8008 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8009 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8010 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8011 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8012                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8013                                  
  8014                                  not_ext:				
  8015 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8016 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8017                                  alt_save:				
  8018 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8019                                  keyret:					
  8020 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  8021                                  
  8022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8023                                  
  8024                                  ;************************************************************************
  8025                                  ;*									*
  8026                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8027                                  ;*									*
  8028                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8029                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8030                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8031                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8032                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8033                                  ;*									*
  8034                                  ;************************************************************************
  8035                                  
  8036                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8037                                  con_rdnd:				
  8038 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8039 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8040 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8041 000001A9 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8042 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8043 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8044 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8045 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8046 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8047                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8048 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8049                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8050 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8051 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8052 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8053 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8054                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8055                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8056                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8057                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8058 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8059 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8060 000001CD C3                      		retn
  8061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8062                                  
  8063                                  gotchr:					
  8064 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8065 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8066 000001D2 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8067 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8068 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8070                                  
  8071                                  notbrk:					
  8072 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8073 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8074 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8075 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8076                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8077                                  
  8078                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8079 000001E3 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8080 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8081 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8082 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8083 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8084 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8085 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8086                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8087                                  rdexit:					
  8088 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8089 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8090                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8091                                  bc_exvec:				
  8092 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8093                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8094 000001FE C3                      		retn
  8095                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8096                                  
  8097                                  ;************************************************************************
  8098                                  ;*									*
  8099                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8100                                  ;*									*
  8101                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8102                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8103                                  ;*									*
  8104                                  ;************************************************************************
  8105                                  
  8106                                  con_writ:
  8107                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8108 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8109                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8110                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8111                                  con_lp:					
  8112 00000201 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8113 00000204 47                      		inc	di
  8114 00000205 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8115                                  					; AL = character to display
  8116 00000207 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8117                                  cc_ret:					
  8118 00000209 F8                      		clc
  8119 0000020A C3                      		retn
  8120                                  
  8121                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8122                                  
  8123                                  ;************************************************************************
  8124                                  ;*									*
  8125                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8126                                  ;*									*
  8127                                  ;************************************************************************
  8128                                  
  8129                                  con_flush:
  8130 0000020B C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8131                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8132 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8133 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8134                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8135                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8136                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8137 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8138 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8139 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8140                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8141 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8142                                  
  8143                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8144                                  
  8145                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8146                                  
  8147                                  ;************************************************************************
  8148                                  ;*									*
  8149                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8150                                  ;*									*
  8151                                  ;************************************************************************
  8152                                  
  8153                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8154                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8155                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8156                                  
  8157                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8158                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8159                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8160                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8161                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8162                                  ;
  8163                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8164                                  
  8165                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8166                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8167                                  
  8168                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8169                                  
  8170                                  ;************************************************************************
  8171                                  ;*									*
  8172                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8173                                  ;*									*
  8174                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8175                                  ;*									*
  8176                                  ;************************************************************************
  8177                                  
  8178                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8179 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8180                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8181                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8182                                  prn_done:
  8183 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8184 00000220 C3                      		retn
  8185                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8186                                  
  8187                                  ;************************************************************************
  8188                                  ;*									*
  8189                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8190                                  ;*									*
  8191                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8192                                  ;*									*
  8193                                  ;************************************************************************
  8194                                  
  8195                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8196                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8197 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8198                                  prn_loop:				
  8199 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8200                                  prn_out:				
  8201 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8202 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8203 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8204 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8205 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8206 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8207 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8208 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8209 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8210 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8211 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8213                                  
  8214                                  _prnwf:					
  8215 00000243 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8216 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8217                                  TestPrnError:				
  8218 00000248 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8219 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8220                                  pmessg:					
  8221 0000024B E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8223                                  
  8224                                  prn_con:				
  8225 0000024E 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8226 0000024F E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8227                                  ;prn_done:				
  8228                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8229                                  prn_done2:
  8230                                  		;clc
  8231                                  		; cf=0
  8232 00000251 C3                      		retn
  8233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8234                                  
  8235                                  ;************************************************************************
  8236                                  ;*									*
  8237                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8238                                  ;*									*
  8239                                  ;************************************************************************
  8240                                  
  8241                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8242 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8243 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8244 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8245                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8246                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8247 0000025A 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8248 0000025C E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8250                                  
  8251                                  ;************************************************************************
  8252                                  ;*									*
  8253                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8254                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8255                                  ;*									*
  8256                                  ;************************************************************************
  8257                                  
  8258                                  prnstat:				
  8259 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8260                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8261                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8262                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8263                                  
  8264                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8265                                  
  8266                                  ;************************************************************************
  8267                                  ;*									*
  8268                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8269                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8270                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8271                                  ;*									*
  8272                                  ;************************************************************************
  8273                                  
  8274                                  prnop:	
  8275 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8276 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8277                                  
  8278                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8279                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8280                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8281                                  
  8282 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  8283 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8284 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8285 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  8286 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8287 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8288 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8289                                  
  8290                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8291                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8292                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8293                                  
  8294                                  NextTest:				
  8295 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8296                                  					; i/o error?
  8297 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8298                                  
  8299                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8300                                  
  8301 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8302                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8303 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8304 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8305 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8306                                  ret1:					
  8307 00000285 C3                      		retn
  8308                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8309                                  
  8310                                  checknotready:				
  8311 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8312 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8313 0000028B C3                      		retn
  8314                                  
  8315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8316                                  
  8317                                  ;************************************************************************
  8318                                  ;*									*
  8319                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8320                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8321                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8322                                  ;*									*
  8323                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8324                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8325                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8326                                  ;*									*
  8327                                  ;************************************************************************
  8328                                  
  8329                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8330                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8331 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8332                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8333 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  8334 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  8335 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8336 00000292 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8337 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8338                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8339 00000298 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8340 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  8341                                  prn_getstat:				
  8342 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8343 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8344 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8345 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8346 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8347 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8348 000002AA 26                      		es
  8349 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  8350                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8351                                  					; lodsb
  8352 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8353 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8354 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8355 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8356                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8357                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8358                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8359 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8360                                  
  8361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8362                                  
  8363                                  prn_bperr:				
  8364 000002B6 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8365                                  prn_berr:				
  8366 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8367                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8368                                  
  8369                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8370                                  
  8371                                  ;************************************************************************
  8372                                  ;*									*
  8373                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8374                                  ;*									*
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  
  8377                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8378                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8379                                  
  8380                                  ;********************************;*
  8381                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8382                                  ;********************************;*
  8383                                  
  8384                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8385                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8386                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8387                                  
  8388                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8389                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8390                                  ;;endstruc
  8391                                  
  8392                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8393                                  
  8394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8395                                  
  8396                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8397                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8398 000002BA C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8399 000002BE 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8400                                  					; ioc_pc
  8401 000002C3 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8402                                  
  8403                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8404 000002C5 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8406                                  
  8407                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8408 000002C8 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8409 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8410 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8411                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8412 000002D2 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8413 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8414                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8415 000002D8 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8416 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8417 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8418 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8419 000002E2 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8420 000002E4 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8421                                  prngetcount:				
  8422                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8423 000002E7 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8424 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8425                                  					; return current retry count
  8426                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8427                                  		; cf=0
  8428                                  		;clc
  8429 000002EE C3                      		retn
  8430                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8431                                  
  8432                                  ;************************************************************************
  8433                                  ;*									*
  8434                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8435                                  ;*									*
  8436                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8437                                  ;************************************************************************
  8438                                  
  8439                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h

  8442                                  					; ioc_pc
  8443 000002F8 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8444 000002FA 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8445 000002FE 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8446 00000300 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported

  8448 00000304 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err

  8452                                  		;clc

  8456                                  prn_query_err:
  8457                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8458                                  		;stc
  8459 00000307 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8461                                  
  8462                                  ;************************************************************************
  8463                                  ;*									*
  8464                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8465                                  ;*									*
  8466                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8467                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8468                                  ;*									*
  8469                                  ;************************************************************************
  8470                                  
  8471                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8472                                  
  8473                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8474                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8475                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8476                                  
  8477                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8478                                  
  8479                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8480                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8481                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8482                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8483                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8484                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8485                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8486                                  
  8487                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8488                                  
  8489                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8490                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8491                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8492                                  
  8493                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8494                                  
  8495                                  ;************************************************************************
  8496                                  ;*									*
  8497                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8498                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8499                                  ;*									*
  8500                                  ;************************************************************************
  8501                                  
  8502                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8503                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8504 0000030A E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8505 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8506 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8507 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8508 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8509 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8510                                  aux1:					
  8511 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8512                                  					; won't return if error
  8513                                  aux2:					
  8514 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  8515 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8516                                  exvec2:					
  8517 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8518                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8519 0000031E C3                      		retn
  8520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8521                                  
  8522                                  ;************************************************************************
  8523                                  ;*									*
  8524                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8525                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8526                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8527                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8528                                  ;*									*
  8529                                  ;************************************************************************
  8530                                  
  8531                                  auxin:					
  8532 0000031F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8533 00000321 E83A00                  		call	auxop
  8534 00000324 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8535                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8536                                  		;retn
  8537                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8538 00000327 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8540                                  
  8541                                  arbad:					
  8542 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8543                                  		;xor	al, al
  8544                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8545                                  		; 11/08/2023
  8546 0000032A B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  8547 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8548                                  
  8549                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8550                                  
  8551                                  ;************************************************************************
  8552                                  ;*									*
  8553                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8554                                  ;*									*
  8555                                  ;************************************************************************
  8556                                  
  8557                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8558 0000032F E85200                  		call	getbx
  8559 00000332 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8560 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8561 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8562 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8563 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8564 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8565 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8566 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8567 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8568 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8569                                  auxdrx:					
  8570 00000349 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8572                                  
  8573                                  auxbus:					
  8574 0000034C E97BFE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8576                                  
  8577                                  ;************************************************************************
  8578                                  ;*									*
  8579                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8580                                  ;*									*
  8581                                  ;************************************************************************
  8582                                  
  8583                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
