 10118                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10119                                  
 10120                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10121                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10122                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10123                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10124                                  ; output:
 10125                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10126                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10127                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10128                                  
 10129                                  readfat:	
 10130                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10131                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10132 00000809 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10133 0000080B B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10134                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10135 0000080E E80500                  		call	read_sector
 10136 00000811 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10137 00000813 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10138                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10139 00000815 C3                      		retn
 10140                                  
 10141                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10142                                  
 10143                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10144                                  
 10145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10146                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10147                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10148                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10149                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10150                                  ;		dh has head
 10151                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10152                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10153                                  ;
 10154                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10155                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10156                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10157                                  ;
 10158                                  ;		carry set
 10159                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10160                                  ;
 10161                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10163                                  
 10164                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10165                                  
 10166                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10167                                  read_sector:

 10345                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines.

 10348                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10349                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10350                                  ;
 10351                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data

 10353

 10355                                  checksingle:		
 10356 000008D8 50                      		push	ax
 10357 000008D9 53                      		push	bx
 10358 000008DA 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10359                                  
 10360                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10361                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10362                                  
 10363 000008DE F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10364 000008E1 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10365 000008E3 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10366                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10367 000008E6 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10368                                  
 10369                                  
 10370                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10371                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10372                                  
 10373 000008E8 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10374                                  					; get physical drive number
 10375 000008EC 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10376 000008ED 57                      		push	di
 10377 000008EE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10378                                  scan_list:				
 10379 000008F2 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10380 000008F6 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10381 000008F8 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10382 000008FA 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10383 000008FE 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10384 00000900 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10385 00000904 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10386 00000905 07                      		pop	es
 10387 00000906 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10388                                  
 10389                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10390                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10391                                  ; in this case.
 10392 0000090A 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1

 10394                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10395 00000911 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10396 00000916 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10397 00000918 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]

 10399                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10400 0000091C 06                      		push	es

 10406 00000926 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret

 10408                                  
 10409                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10410                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application

 10466                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10467                                  
 10468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10469                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10470                                  ;
 10471                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10472                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10473                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10474                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10475                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10476                                  ;	ds = cs
 10477                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10478                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10479                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10480                                  ;
 10481                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10482                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10484                                  
 10485                                  diskrd:	
 10486                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10487                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10488 00000961 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10489                                  
 10490                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10491                                  
 10492                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10493                                  diskio:
 10494 00000966 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10495 00000968 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10496 0000096C E801FC                  		call	SetDrive
 10497 0000096F 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10498 00000973 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10499                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10500 00000976 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10501                                  
 10502                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10503                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10504                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10505                                  
 10506 00000978 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10507                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10508                                  					; unformatted_media
 10509 0000097D 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10510 0000097F 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10511 00000983 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10512                                  
 10513                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10514                                  
 10515 00000987 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10516 00000989 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10517 0000098B 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10518                                  		;adc	si, 0
 10519                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10520 0000098D D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 10521 0000098F 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10522                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10523 00000994 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 10524                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 10525                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10526 00000996 09F6                    		or	si, si
 10527 00000998 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10528 0000099A 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10529 0000099E 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10530 000009A0 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10532                                  
 10533                                  sanity32:				
 10534 000009A2 0336[2305]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10535 000009A6 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10536 000009AA 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10537 000009AC 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 10538 000009AE 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10539 000009B2 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 10540                                  
 10541                                  sanityok:				
 10542 000009B4 8B16[2305]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10543 000009B8 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10544 000009BC 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10545                                  
 10546                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10547                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10548                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10549                                  
 10550 000009C0 A3[2505]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10551                                  
 10552                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10553                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10554                                  
 10555 000009C3 06                      		push	es
 10556                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10557                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10558 000009C4 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 10559 000009C6 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 10560 000009C8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10561                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10562                                  					; current disk parm table
 10563 000009CD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10564 000009D1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10565 000009D5 07                      		pop	es
 10566 000009D6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10567                                  					; fnon_removable
 10568 000009DB 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10569 000009DD E8F8FE                  		call	checksingle
 10570                                  
 10571                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10572                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10573                                  ; the proper error code.
 10574                                  
 10575 000009E0 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 10576 000009E5 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 10577 000009E7 E8960E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 10578                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 10579                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 10580 000009EA E84700                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 10581                                  
 10582                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 10583                                  
 10584                                  skip_setup:
 10585                                  
 10586                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 10587                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 10588                                  				
 10589 000009ED 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10590 000009EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10591                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10592                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 10593                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10594 000009F1 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]
 10595 000009F5 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10596 000009F7 A3[2105]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10597 000009FA A1[2505]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 10598 000009FD F7F1                    		div	cx ; 02/09/2023
 10599                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10600                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 10601                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.

 11036 00000C35 06                      		push	es

 11044 00000C47 06                      		push	es

 11046 00000C4C 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11047                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11048 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 11049 00000C52 C3                      		retn

 11051                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11052                                  
 11053                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11054                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11055                                  
 11056                                  fastspeed:

 11058                                  					; ftoobig

 11060 00000C5A 06                      		push	es

 11062 00000C5F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11063 00000C61 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11064 00000C65 07                      		pop	es

 11068                                  notready:

 11073                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11074                                  
 11075                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11076                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11077                                  
 11078                                  maperror:

 11080 00000C6C 06                      		push	es

 11085                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11086 00000C74 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11087                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11088 00000C77 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11089 00000C7A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11090                                  		; 02/09/2023

 11098 00000C80 59                      		pop	cx
 11099 00000C81 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11100 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11101                                  
 11102                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11103                                  
 11104                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11105                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11106                                  
 11107                                  set_tim:		
 11108 00000C83 50                      		push	ax
 11109 00000C84 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11110                                  
 11111                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11112                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11113                                  
 11114 00000C87 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11115 00000C8B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11116 00000C8D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11117                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11118                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11119 00000C91 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11120                                  setaccess:				
 11121 00000C93 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11122 00000C98 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11123 00000C9C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11124                                  done_set:				
 11125 00000CA0 F8                      		clc
 11126                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11127 00000CA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11128 00000CA2 C3                      		retn

 11130                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11131                                  
 11132                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11133                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11134                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11135                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11136                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11137                                  
 11138                                  again:	
 11139 00000CA3 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11140 00000CA6 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11141 00000CA9 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11142                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11143 00000CAB 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11144 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11146                                  
 11147                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11148 00000CAD 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11149 00000CAF C3                      		retn

 11255                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11256                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11257                                  ;
 11258                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11259                                  ;
 11260                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11261                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11262                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11263                                  ;
 11264                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11265                                  
 11266                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11267                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11268                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11269 00000CE0 E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11270 00000CE3 06                      		push	es
 11271 00000CE4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11272 00000CE8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11273                                  					; RAWIO
 11274 00000CED 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11275 00000CF1 07                      		pop	es
 11276 00000CF2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11277                                  
 11278                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11279                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11280                                  
 11281                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11282 00000CF4 BE[B10C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11283                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11284                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11285 00000CF7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11286 00000CF9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11287                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11288 00000CFB BE[C40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11289                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11290                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11291                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11292 00000CFE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11293 00000D00 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11294 00000D02 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11295 00000D05 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11296 00000D07 98                      		cbw
 11297 00000D08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11298 00000D0A 46                      		inc	si
 11299 00000D0B 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11300 00000D0D 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11301                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11302 00000D10 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11303                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11304                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11305 00000D15 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11306 00000D17 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11308                                  
 11309                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11310                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11311                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h

 11320                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11321                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11322                                  ;
 11323                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11324                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11325                                  ;
 11326                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11327                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11328                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11329                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11330                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11331                                  
 11332                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11333                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11334                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11335                                  
 11336 00000D1C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11337 00000D20 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11338                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11339 00000D23 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11340 00000D27 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11341 00000D2A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11342 00000D2E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11343                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11344 00000D31 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11345 00000D34 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11346 00000D38 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11347 00000D3B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11348 00000D3D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11349                                  					
 11350                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11351 00000D40 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11352 00000D43 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11353                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11354 00000D46 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11355 00000D48 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11356 00000D49 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11357                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11358                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11359                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11360 00000D4E E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11361 00000D51 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch

 11363 00000D55 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11364 00000D57 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11365                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11366                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11367 00000D5A 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11368                                  					; This is where	the result goes

 11370                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11371 00000D60 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11372 00000D61 06                      		push	es
 11373 00000D62 1F                      		pop	ds
 11374 00000D63 07                      		pop	es

 11378                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11379                                  		;clc

 11416                                  		; 10/12/2022

 11435                                  
 11436                                  		; The media changed (maybe) so we will have to do a set dasd
 11437                                  		; the next time we format a track

 11553                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11554                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11555                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11556                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11557                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11558                                  ;
 11559                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11560                                  ;
 11561                                  ; output:
 11562                                  ;	for status call:
 11563                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11564                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11565                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11566                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11567                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11568                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11569                                  ;
 11570                                  ;	for format track:
 11571                                  ;		carry set if error
 11572                                  ;
 11573                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11574                                  
 11575                                  ; 16/03/2019

 11727                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11728                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11729                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11730                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11731                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11732                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11733                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11734                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11735                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 11840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11841                                  
 11842                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11843                                  
 11844                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11845                                  ;
 11846                                  ; TrackIo:
 11847                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11848                                  ;
 11849                                  ;   input:
 11850                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11851                                  ;		  3 = write
 11852                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11853                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11854                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11855                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11856                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11857                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11858                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11859                                  ;
 11860                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11861                                  
 11862                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11863                                  		
 11864                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11865                                  TrackIo:	
 11866                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11867 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11868 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11869 00000F99 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11870                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11871 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11872 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11873 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 11874 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 11875 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 11876 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 11877                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 12097                                  
 12098                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12099                                  
 12100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12101                                  ;
 12102                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12103                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12104                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12105                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12106                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12107                                  ;
 12108                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12109                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12110                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12111                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12112                                  ;
 12113                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12114                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12115                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12116                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12117                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12118                                  ;
 12119                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12120                                  
 12121                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12122                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12123 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 12124 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 12125                                  
 12126                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12127                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12128                                  
 12129 00001077 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12130 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12131 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12132 00001080 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12133 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12134 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12136                                  
 12137                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:

 12145                                  
 12146 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 12148                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12149 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 12153                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 12160 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx

 12172 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12173                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12174 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12175 000010C3 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1

 12178                                  
 12179                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12180                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12181 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12182 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0

 12258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12259                                  ;
 12260                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12261                                  ;
 12262                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12263                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12264                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12265                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12266                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12276                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12277                                  					; Reset while formatting?

 12279                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12280                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12285 00001116 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM

 12295                                  
 12296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12297                                  ;
 12298                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12299                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12300                                  ;
 12301                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12302                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12303                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12304                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12305                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12306                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12307                                  ;
 12308                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12309                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12310                                  ;
 12311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12312                                  
 12313                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12314                                  ToRom:	
 12315 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 12316 00001120 56                      		push	si
 12317                                  
 12318                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12319                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12320                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12321                                  
 12322 00001121 F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12323 00001126 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12324 00001128 50                      		push	ax

 12326 0000112A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]

 12331 00001134 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12332                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12333                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12334 00001139 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12335 0000113D 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12336                                  		
 12337 00001141 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12338 00001144 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12339 00001148 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12340 0000114B 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12341                                  					; Important for	format
 12342 0000114F 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12343                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12344                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12345 00001154 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12346 00001155 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12347 00001157 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12348                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12349 0000115C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12350 0000115D 58                      		pop	ax
 12351                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12352 0000115E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12353 00001162 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12354 00001164 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12355 00001168 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number

 12360 00001174 5E                      		pop	si
 12361 00001175 5B                      		pop	bx

 12366                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12367                                  
 12368                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12369                                  
 12370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12371                                  ;
 12372                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12373                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12374                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12375                                  ;
 12376                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12377                                  
 12378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12379                                  ioctl_getown:
 12380 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12381 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12382                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12383 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12384                                  ownloop:				
 12385 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12386 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12387                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12388 00001188 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12389                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12390                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12391 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12392                                  getnextBDS:				
 12393 0000118F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12394 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12395                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12396                                  
 12397                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12400                                  ; in al to al.
 12401                                  ;
 12402                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12403                                  
 12404                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12405                                  ioctl_setown:
 12406 00001194 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12407 00001197 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12408                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12409 0000119C E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12410                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12411 0000119F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12412                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12413                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12414                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12415                                  
 12416                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12417                                  ;
 12418                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12419                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12420                                  ;
 12421                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12422                                  
 12423                                  exitown:				
 12424 000011A3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12425                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12426 000011A5 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12427                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12428                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12429 000011AA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12430 000011AC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12431                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12432                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12433 000011B0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12434                                  exitnomult:				
 12435 000011B2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12436 000011B6 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12437                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12438                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12439                                  		; cf=0
 12440                                  		;clc
 12441 000011B9 C3                      		retn

 12495                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12496                                  ;	get media id
 12497                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12498                                  ;
 12499                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12500                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12501                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12502                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12503                                  ;
 12504                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12505                                  ;
 12506                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12507                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12508                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12509                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12510                                  ;
 12511                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12512                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12513                                  ;
 12514                                  ; LOGIC:
 12515                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12516                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12517                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12518                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12519                                  ;
 12520                                  ; {
 12521                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12522                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12523                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12524                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12525                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12526                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12527                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12528                                  ;		};
 12529                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12530                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12531                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12532                                  ;		};
 12533                                  ;	else
 12534                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12535                                  ;
 12536                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12537                                  
 12538                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12539                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12540                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12541                                  
 12542                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12543                                  GetMediaId:
 12544 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12545 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12546 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12547 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12548 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12549                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12550 000011F9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12551                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12552 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12553                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12554 00001200 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12555 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12556                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12557                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12558 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12559 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12560 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12561                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12562 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 12563                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12564                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12565 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12566 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12567                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12568                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12569 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12570                                  	
 12571                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12572                                  		; cf = 0
 12573                                  		;clc
 12574                                  
 12575 00001219 C3                      		retn
 12576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12577                                  
 12578                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12579 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12580 0000121C F9                      		stc
 12581                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12582 0000121D C3                      		retn
 12583                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12584                                  
 12585                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12586                                  
 12587                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12588                                  ;  set media id
 12589                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12590                                  
 12591                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12592                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12593                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12594                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12595                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12596                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12597                                  ;
 12598                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12599                                  ;
 12600                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12601                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12602                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12603                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12604                                  ;
 12605                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12606                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12607                                  ;
 12608                                  ; logic:
 12609                                  ;
 12610                                  ; {
 12611                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12612                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12613                                  ;	BootIo;
 12614                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12615                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12616                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12617                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12618                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12619                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12620                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12621                                  ;		};
 12622                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12623                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12624                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12625                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12626                                  ;		};
 12627                                  ;	else
 12628                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12629                                  ;
 12630                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12631                                  
 12632                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12633                                  SetMediaId:
 12634 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12635 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12636                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12637 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12638 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12639 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 12640 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12641 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 12642 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12643                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12644 00001233 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12645                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12646 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12647 0000123A 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12648                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12649 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12650 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12651 00001242 57                      		push	di
 12652 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12653 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 12654 00001245 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12655 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12656 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12657 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12658 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12659                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12660                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12661 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12662 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12663 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 12664 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12665 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 12666 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12667 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12668 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12669 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12670 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12671                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12672                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12673 0000126D C3                      		retn
 12674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12675                                  
 12676                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12677 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12678 00001270 F9                      		stc
 12679                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12680 00001271 C3                      		retn
 12681                                  
 12682                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12683                                  
 12684                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12685                                  
 12686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12687                                  ;	BootIo
 12688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12689                                  ;
 12690                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12691                                  ;
 12692                                  ; input :
 12693                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12694                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12695                                  ;
 12696                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12697                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12698                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12699                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12700                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12701                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12702                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12703                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12704                                  ;
 12705                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12706                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12707                                  ;
 12708                                  ; logic:
 12709                                  ;
 12710                                  ; {
 12711                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12712                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12713                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12714                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12715                                  ; }
 12716                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12717                                  
 12718                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12719                                  BootIo:	
 12720 00001272 06                      		push	es
 12721 00001273 57                      		push	di
 12722 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 12723 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 12724 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12725                                  
 12726                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12727                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12728                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12729                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12730                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12731                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12732                                  
 12733 00001277 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12734 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12735 0000127C 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12736 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12737 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 12738 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 12739 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 12740 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 12741 00001289 C3                      		retn
 12742                                  
 12743                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12744                                  
 12745                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12746                                  
 12747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12748                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12750                                  ;
 12751                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12752                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12753                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12754                                  ; history in the flags.
 12755                                  ;
 12756                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12757                                  ;
 12758                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12759                                  ;
 12760                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12761                                  ;
 12762                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12763                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12764                                  ;
 12765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12766                                  
 12767                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12768 0000128A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12769 0000128E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12770 00001290 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12771                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12772 00001292 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12773                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12774                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12775 00001297 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12776 00001299 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12777 0000129E 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12778 000012A0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12779 000012A3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12780                                  
 12781                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12782                                  
 12783 000012A5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12784 000012A7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12785                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12786                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12787 000012A9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12788 000012AB 53                      		push	bx
 12789 000012AC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12790                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12791                                  					; physical drive
 12792 000012AF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12793 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
 12794                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12795 000012B3 C3                      		retn
 12796                                  
 12797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12798                                  
 12799                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12800                                  
 12801                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12802                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12803                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12804                                  ;
 12805                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12806                                  ;
 12807                                  ; INPUT :
 12808                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12809                                  ;
 12810                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12811                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12812                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12813                                  
 12814                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12815                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12816 000012B4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12817 000012B8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12818                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12819                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12820 000012BB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12821                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12822 000012BD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12823                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12824                                  					; unformatted_media
 12825 000012C2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12826 000012C4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12827                                  
 12828                                  GafDone:				
 12829 000012C6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12830 000012C9 C3                      		retn
 12831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12832                                  
 12833                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12834                                  
 12835                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12836                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12837                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12838                                  ;
 12839                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12840                                  ;
 12841                                  ; input :
 12842                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12843                                  ;
 12844                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12845                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12846                                  
 12847                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12848                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12849 000012CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12850 000012CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12851                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12852 000012D1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12853                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12854                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12855 000012D6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12856 000012DA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12857                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12858 000012DC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12859                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12860                                  					; unformatted_media
 12861                                  saf_Done:				
 12862 000012E1 C3                      		retn
 12863                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12864                                  
 12865                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12866                                  
 12867                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12868                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12869                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12870                                  ;
 12871                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12872                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12873                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12874                                  ;
 12875                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12876                                  
 12877                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12878                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12879 000012E2 06                      		push	es
 12880 000012E3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12881 000012E7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12882                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12883                                  
 12884                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12885                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 12886                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 12887                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 12888                                  
 12889 000012EB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12890                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12891 000012ED 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12892                                  ioctl_support:
 12893 000012EF 0E                      		push	cs
 12894 000012F0 07                      		pop	es
