 30867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30868                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30869                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30870                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30871                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30872                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30873                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30874                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30875                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 30876                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 30877                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 30878                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 30879                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30880                                  
 30881                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30882                                  UmbHead:
 30883                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 30884                                  
 30885                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30886                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 30887                                  	;push	es
 30888                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 30889                                  
 30890                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30891                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30892                                  
 30893 00002C34 B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30894 00002C36 CD21                    	int	21h
 30895                                  
 30896 00002C38 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 30897                                  	
 30898                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30899 00002C3C 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30900 00002C3F F5                      	cmc
 30901                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 30902 00002C40 C3                      	retn
 30903                                  
 30904                                  ; 01/01/2023
 30905                                  ;%if 0
 30906                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30907                                  ;	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30908                                  ;
 30909                                  ;	clc				; Else, it isn't (CLC done by prev cmp)
 30910                                  ;	;jmp	short uhX
 30911                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 30912                                  ;	retn
 30913                                  ;uhE:	
 30914                                  ;	stc
 30915                                  ;uhX:	
 30916                                  ;	;pop	bx ; *
 30917                                  ;	;pop	es
 30918                                  ;	;pop	ds ; ?
 30919                                  ;	;pop	si ; ?
 30920                                  ;	retn
 30921                                  ;%endif
 30922                                  
 30923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 30925                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30926                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 30927                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 30928                                  ; USES:   Flags
 30929                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30930                                  
 30931                                  isSysMCB:
 30932                                  	;push	ax
 30933                                  
 30934                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30935                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30936                                  	;je	short ism10
 30937                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 30938                                  	;;je	short ism10
 30939                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 30940                                  	;jne	short ismX
 30941 00002C41 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 30942 00002C47 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 30943                                  ism10:	
 30944                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 30945                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 30946 00002C49 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 30947                                  ismX:	
 30948                                  	;pop	ax
 30949 00002C50 C3                      	retn
 30950                                  
 30951                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30952                                  
 30953                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30954                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 30955                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30956                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 30957                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 30958                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 30959                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30960                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30961                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 30962                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 30963                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 30964                                  ;      ...
 30965                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 30966                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30967                                  
 30968                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30969                                  AddrToUmb:
 30970                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30971                                  	;push	cx
 30972                                  	;push	dx
 30973 00002C51 06                      	push	es
 30974                                  
 30975 00002C52 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 30976                                  
 30977 00002C54 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 30978 00002C57 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 30979                                  
 30980                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30981                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 30982 00002C59 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 30983                                  
 30984                                  	; 22/07/2023
 30985                                  atu10:
 30986 00002C5B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 30987                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30988                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 30989                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 30990                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 30991                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 30992                                  
 30993                                  ;atu10:	
 30994                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 30995 00002C5D 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 30996 00002C5F 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 30997                                  
 30998 00002C61 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 30999 00002C64 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31000                                  
 31001 00002C66 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31002                                  atu20:	
 31003                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31004                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31005                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31006                                  	; ax = es
 31007                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31008 00002C67 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31009 00002C6C 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31010 00002C72 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31011                                  
 31012                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31013                                  
 31014                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31015                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31016                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31017 00002C74 40                      	inc	ax
 31018                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31019                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31020 00002C75 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31021                                  
 31022                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31023                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31024                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31025                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31026                                  
 31027                                  atu30:	
 31028                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31029                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31030                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31031                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31032 00002C77 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31033 00002C79 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31034                                  atuE:	
 31035 00002C7B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31036 00002C7D 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31037                                  atuX:	
 31038 00002C7E 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31039                                  	
 31040 00002C80 07                      	pop	es	
 31041                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31042                                  	;pop	dx
 31043                                  	;pop	cx
 31044 00002C81 C3                      	retn
 31045                                  
 31046                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31047                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31048                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31049                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31050                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31051                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31052                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31053                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31054                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31055                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31056                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31057                                  
 31058                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31059                                  convUMB:
 31060 00002C82 2E833E[852B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31061 00002C88 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31062 00002C8A E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31063                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31064                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31065                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31066                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31067 00002C8D 40                      	inc	ax
 31068 00002C8E 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31069 00002C90 48                      	dec	ax
 31070                                  cu10:	
 31071 00002C91 C3                      	retn
 31072                                  
 31073                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31074                                  ;%if 0
 31075                                  ;
 31076                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31077                                  ;;*** setUMBs - links umbs and sets allocation strategy for a load
 31078                                  ;;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 31079                                  ;; of the usual HIGH_FIRST. See the code.
 31080                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31081                                  ;; ENTRY:  None
 31082                                  ;; EXIT:   None
 31083                                  ;; ERROR:  None
 31084                                  ;; USES:   Flags, fm_umb, fm_strat
 31085                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31086                                  ;
 31087                                  ;setUMBs:

 31091                                  ;	pop	bx

 31096                                  
 31097                                  ; 18/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 31098                                  ; loadLow subroutine is not used anywhere of IO.SYS 6.22 (& 5.0)
 31099                                  %if 0
 31100                                  
 31101                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31102                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31103                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31104                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31105                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31106                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31107                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31108                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31109                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31110                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31111                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31112                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31113                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31115                                  
 31116                                  loadLow:
 31117                                  	;push	ds
 31118                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 31119                                  	;pop	ds	
 31120                                  
 31121                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 31122                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 31123                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31124                                  	jne	short ll10
 31125                                  
 31126                                  	stc
 31127                                  ll15:
 31128                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31129                                  	;stc
 31130                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31131                                  	retn
 31132                                  ll10:	
 31133                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31134                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31135                                  
 31136                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31137                                  	retn
 31138                                  
 31139                                  	;mov	al,1
 31140                                  	;clc
 31141                                  ;llX:
 31142                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31143                                  	;retn
 31144                                  
 31145                                  %endif
 31146                                  
 31147                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31148                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 31149                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31150                                  ; ENTRY:  None

 31608                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31609                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 31610                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 31611                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31612                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31613                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 31614                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 31615                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31616                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31617                                  
 31618                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31619                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 31620                                  findUMB:
 31621                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31622                                  	;push	ax
 31623                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31624 00002D5A 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31625                                  	;push	dx
 31626                                  
 31627 00002D5B 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31628                                  
 31629 00002D5D 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 31630                                  
 31631 00002D5F E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31632                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31633                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31634 00002D62 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31635                                  
 31636                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31637                                  fu10:
 31638 00002D64 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 31639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31640                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 31641                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 31642                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 31643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31644                                  
 31645                                  ;fu10:	
 31646 00002D66 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 31647 00002D68 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 31648                                  
 31649 00002D6A E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31650 00002D6D 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 31651                                  
 31652 00002D6F 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31653                                  fu20:	
 31654                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31655                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31656                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31657 00002D70 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 31658 00002D76 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31659                                  
 31660                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31661                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31662                                  	; ax = es
 31663                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 31664                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31665 00002D78 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31666 00002D7D 40                      	inc	ax
 31667                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31668                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 31669 00002D7E EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 31670                                  fuE:	
 31671 00002D80 F9                      	stc
 31672                                  fuX:
 31673                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31674                                  	;pop	dx
 31675                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31676 00002D81 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31677                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 31678 00002D82 C3                      	retn
 31679                                  
 31680                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31681                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 31682                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31683                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31684                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 31685                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 31686                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31687                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31688                                  
 31689                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31690                                  BigFree:
 31691                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31692                                  	;push	bx
 31693 00002D83 51                      	push	cx
 31694                                  
 31695 00002D84 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 31696 00002D87 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 31697                                  
 31698 00002D89 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31699 00002D8B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31700                                  
 31701                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31702                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31703                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31704                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31705                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31706                                  
 31707                                  bf10:	
 31708 00002D8D E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31709 00002D90 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 31710                                  
 31711                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31712 00002D92 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31713 00002D98 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 31714                                  
 31715 00002D9A 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31716                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31717 00002D9E 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 31718                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31719                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31720 00002DA0 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 31721                                  
 31722 00002DA2 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31723                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31724 00002DA4 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 31725                                  bf20:	
 31726                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31727                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31728                                  	; 19/07/2023
 31729                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 31730 00002DA6 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31731 00002DAC 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31732                                  
 31733                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 31734 00002DAE 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31735                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31736 00002DB0 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31737 00002DB5 40                      	inc     ax
 31738 00002DB6 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31739                                  
 31740 00002DB8 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 31741                                  
 31742 00002DBA 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31743 00002DBC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31744 00002DBE 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31745 00002DC0 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 31746                                  bfE:	
 31747 00002DC2 F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31748                                  bfX:
 31749 00002DC3 59                      	pop	cx
 31750                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31751                                  	;pop	bx
 31752 00002DC4 C3                      	retn
 31753                                  
 31754                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31755                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31756                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31757                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31758                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31759                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31760                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31761                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31762                                  
 31763                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31764                                  
 31765                                  isSpecified:
 31766                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31767                                  	;push	ax
 31768                                  
 31769 00002DC5 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 31770 00002DC7 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 31771                                  
 31772                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31773                                  	;
 31774                                  	;push	ds
 31775                                  	;push	cs
 31776                                  	;pop	ds
 31777                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31778                                  	;pop	ds
 31779                                  	
 31780                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31781                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31782                                  	; ds = cs
 31783 00002DC9 8A87[301F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31784                                  
 31785 00002DCD 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31786                                  
 31787                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31788                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31789                                  	;pop	ax
 31790                                  
 31791 00002DCF C3                      	retn
 31792                                  
 31793                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31794                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31795                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31796                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31797                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31798                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31799                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31800                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31801                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31802                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31803                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31804                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31805                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31806                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31807                                  
 31808                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 31809                                  
 31810                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31811                                  
 31812                                  shrinkMCB:
 31813                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 31814                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31815                                  	;push	bx
 31816 00002DD0 51                      	push	cx
 31817 00002DD1 06                      	push	es
 31818                                  
 31819 00002DD2 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31820                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31821                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31822                                  
 31823 00002DD4 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31824                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31825 00002DD9 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 31826                                  
 31827 00002DDB 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31828                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31829                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31830                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31831                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31832                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 31833                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31834 00002DDE 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 31835 00002DE0 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31836                                  
 31837 00002DE2 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31838                                  	
 31839                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31840                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31841 00002DE7 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31842                                  
 31843 00002DE9 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31844 00002DEE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31845                                  
 31846 00002DF4 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 31847 00002DF6 40                      	inc	ax
 31848 00002DF7 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31849                                  
 31850 00002DF9 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 31851 00002DFB 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 31852                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31853                                  	; ax > 0
 31854 00002DFD 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31855                                  
 31856                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31857 00002DFE 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31858                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31859 00002E03 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31860                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31861                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31862                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31863                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31864                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31865                                  
 31866                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31867 00002E07 E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31868                                  
 31869                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31870                                  	; cf=0
 31871                                  	;clc
 31872                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31873                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31874                                  smE:	
 31875                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31876                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31877                                  	;stc
 31878                                  smX:	
 31879                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 31880 00002E0A 07                      	pop	es
 31881 00002E0B 59                      	pop	cx
 31882                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31883                                  	;pop	bx
 31884 00002E0C C3                      	retn
 31885                                  
 31886                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31887                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31888                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31889                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31890                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31891                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31892                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31893                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31894                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31895                                  ;
 31896                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31897                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31898                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31899                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31900                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31901                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31902                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31903                                  ;       Endif
 31904                                  ;    Endif
 31905                                  ; Endif
 31906                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31907                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31908                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31909                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31910                                  ;    ENDIF
 31911                                  ; ENDIF
 31912                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31913                                  
 31914                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31915                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 31916                                  _hideUMB_:
 31917                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31918                                  	; ds = cs
 31919                                  
 31920                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31921                                  	;push	bx
 31922                                  	;push	dx
 31923 00002E0D 06                      	push	es
 31924                                  
 31925 00002E0E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31926 00002E10 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31927 00002E13 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 31928                                  
 31929 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31930 00002E17 E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31931 00002E1A 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31932                                  
 31933 00002E1C 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31934 00002E1D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31935 00002E1F E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31936 00002E22 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31937                                  
 31938 00002E23 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31939 00002E25 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31940                                  
 31941 00002E27 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31942 00002E29 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 31943                                  
 31944 00002E2B 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31945 00002E2D E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31946 00002E30 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 31947                                  hu_10:	
 31948                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31949                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 31950                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31951                                  ;isTiny:
 31952                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 31953                                  	;or	al,al
 31954 00002E32 800E[2C1F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 31955 00002E37 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 31956                                  
 31957 00002E39 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31958 00002E3C 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31959                                  
 31960 00002E3E 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 31961 00002E40 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31962                                  
 31963 00002E42 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31964 00002E44 E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31965 00002E47 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31966                                  
 31967 00002E49 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31968                                  hu_30:	
 31969 00002E4B 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31970                                  
 31971 00002E4D E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31972                                  
 31973 00002E50 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31974 00002E52 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31975                                  
 31976 00002E54 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31977 00002E56 E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31978                                  hu_X:	
 31979 00002E59 07                      	pop	es
 31980                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31981                                  	;pop	dx
 31982                                  	;pop	bx
 31983 00002E5A C3                      	retn
 31984                                  
 31985                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31986                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31987                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31988                                  ; Entry:  None
 31989                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31990                                  ; Error:  None
 31991                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31992                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31993                                  
 31994                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31995                                  UnFreeze:
 31996                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31997                                  	;push	ax
 31998 00002E5B 06                      	push	es
 31999                                  
 32000 00002E5C E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32001 00002E5F 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32002                                  
 32003                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32004                                  uf10:
 32005 00002E61 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32006                                  
 32007                                  ; ------------------------------
 32008                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32009                                  ; ------------------------------
 32010                                  
 32011                                  ;uf10:	
 32012 00002E63 E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32013 00002E66 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32014 00002E68 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32015                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32016                                  	; ax <> es
 32017 00002E6B 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 32018                                  uf20:	
 32019                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32020                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32021                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32022 00002E6D 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32023 00002E73 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32024                                  
 32025                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32026                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32027                                  	; ax = es
 32028                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 32029                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32030 00002E75 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32031 00002E7A 40                      	inc	ax
 32032                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32033                                  	;mov	es,ax
 32034 00002E7B EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 32035                                  ufX:	
 32036 00002E7D 07                      	pop	es
 32037                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32038                                  	;pop	ax
 32039 00002E7E C3                      	retn
 32040                                  
 32041                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32042                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32043                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32044                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32045                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32046                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32047                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32048                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32049                                  
 32050                                  isFrozMCB:
 32051                                  	;push	ax
 32052                                  
 32053                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32054                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32055 00002E7F 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32056 00002E85 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 32057                                  
 32058                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32059                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32060 00002E87 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32061 00002E8E 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 32062                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32063                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32064 00002E90 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32065 00002E97 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 32066                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32067                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32068 00002E99 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32069 00002EA0 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 32070                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32071                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32072 00002EA2 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32073                                  ifmX:	
 32074                                  	;pop	ax
 32075 00002EA9 C3                      	retn
 32076                                  
 32077                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32078                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32079                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32081                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32082                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32087 00002EAA 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8

 32090 00002EBF 26C7060C00454E          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32091 00002EC6 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32092 00002ECD C3                      	retn
 32093                                  
 32094                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32095                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32096                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32097                                  ; Entry:  None
 32098                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32099                                  ; Error:  None
 32100                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32101                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32102                                  
 32103                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2  
 32104                                  FreezeUM:
 32105                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32106                                  	;push	ax
 32107                                  	;push	cx
 32108                                  	;push	dx
 32109 00002ECE 06                      	push	es
 32110                                  
 32111                                  	;;call	GetLoadUMB
 32112                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32113                                  	; ds = cs
 32114                                  	;mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32115 00002ECF A0[2F1F]                	mov	al,[UmbLoad] 	
 32116                                  
 32117 00002ED2 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32118 00002ED4 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32119                                  
 32120 00002ED6 E85BFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32121                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32122                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32123 00002ED9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32124                                  
 32125                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32126                                  fum10:
 32127 00002EDB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32128                                  
 32129                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32130                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 32131                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 32132                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 32133                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32134                                  
 32135                                  ;fum10:	
 32136 00002EDD E861FD                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32137 00002EE0 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 32138

 32140                                  fum20:	
 32141 00002EE3 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 32142 00002EE5 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 32143                                  
 32144                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 32145 00002EE7 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32146 00002EED 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 32147                                  
 32148 00002EEF E8B8FF                  	call	frezMCB
 32149                                  fum30:	
 32150                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32151                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32152                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32153 00002EF2 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32154 00002EF8 7408                    	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 32155                                  
 32156                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32157                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32158                                  	; ax = es
 32159                                  	;mov	ax,es
 32160                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32161 00002EFA 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]

 32165 00002F00 EBD9                    	jmp	short fum10

 32586                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32587                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32588                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32589                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32590                                  
 32591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32592                                  ;
 32593                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32594                                  ;
 32595                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32596                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32597                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32598                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32599                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32600                                  ;
 32601                                  ;	Output : none
 32602                                  ;
 32603                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32604                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32605                                  ;
 32606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32607                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32608                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32609                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32610                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32611                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32612                                  
 32613                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32614                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32615                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 32616                                  InitDevLoad:
 32617                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32618                                  	;push	es ; *
 32619                                  
 32620                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32621                                  	; ds = cs
 32622 00002FEC 803E[811F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32623                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32624                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32625 00002FF1 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32626                                  
 32627                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32628                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32629                                  ; %if 0
 32630                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32631 00002FF3 803E[711F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 32632                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32633 00002FF8 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 32634                                  
 32635                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32636                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32637                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32638                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32639                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32640                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32641                                  
 32642 00002FFA E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32643                                  
 32644 00002FFD E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32645 00003000 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32646 00003003 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32647 00003006 9C                      	pushf
 32648 00003007 E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32649 0000300A 9D                      	popf
 32650                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32651                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 32652                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 32653 0000300B EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 32654                                  
 32655                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 32656                                  
 32657                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32658                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32659                                  InitForConv:
 32660                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32661                                  	; ds = cs
 32662 0000300D E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32663                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32664 00003010 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32665 00003012 E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32666 00003015 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32667                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 32668 00003018 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32669                                  					;  in low memory
 32670                                  InitForHi:
 32671                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32672                                  	; ds = cs

 32751                                  ;
 32752                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32753                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32754                                  ;

 32772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32773                                  ;
 32774                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32775                                  ;
 32776                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32777                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32778                                  ;		 the device.
 32779                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32780                                  ;
 32781                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32782                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32783                                  ;	UMB.
 32784                                  ;
 32785                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32786                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32787                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32788                                  ;
 32789                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32790                                  
 32791                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32792                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)

 32795                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32796                                  	; ds = cs

 32799 00003063 CD21                    	int	21h
 32800                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32801                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32802                                  
 32803 00003065 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32804                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32805                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32806 00003067 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32807

 32809                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32810                                  	; ds = cs

 32812                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32813 0000306E 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32814                                  
 32815 00003070 43                      	inc	bx
 32816                                  
 32817 00003071 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32818 00003074 CD21                    	int	21h
 32819 00003076 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32820                                  
 32821                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32822                                  	;dec	ax
 32823                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32824                                  	;
 32825                                  PrepareMark:
 32826 00003078 1E                      	push	ds
 32827 00003079 48                      	dec	ax
 32828 0000307A 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32829 0000307C C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32830 00003082 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32831 00003088 40                      	inc	ax
 32832 00003089 1F                      	pop	ds
 32833                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32834                                  	; ds = cs
 32835                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables

 32846 00003094 C3                      	retn

 32849                                  %if 1

 32852                                  gufd_error:

 32855 0000309A EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32856                                  %endif

 32859                                  %if 0

 32861                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0

 32875                                  ;
 32876                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32877                                  ;
 32878                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32879                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32880                                  ;
 32881                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32882                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32883                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32884                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32885                                  ;
 32886                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32887                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32888                                  ;
 32889                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32890

 32892                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32893

 32896                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32897                                  	;push	di
 32898 0000309D 1E                      	push	ds
 32899 0000309E 56                      	push	si
 32900 0000309F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 32902 000030A7 40                      	inc	ax
 32903 000030A8 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32904                                  
 32905                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32906                                  
 32907 000030AC 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 32908                                  	
 32909                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32910                                  	; ds = cs
 32911                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32912 000030AD C536[7A03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32913                                  
 32914 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32915 000030B3 FC                      	cld
 32916                                  dsm_again:
 32917 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 32918 000030B5 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32919 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32920 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32921 000030BB EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32922                                  isit_slash:
 32923 000030BD 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 32924 000030BF 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32925 000030C1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32926 000030C3 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32927                                  isit_null:
 32928 000030C5 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32929 000030C7 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32930 000030C9 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32931                                  
 32932 000030CB BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32933 000030CE B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32934                                  dsm_next_char:
 32935 000030D1 AC                      	lodsb
 32936 000030D2 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32937 000030D4 7407                    	jz	short blankout

 32939 000030D8 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32940 000030DA AA                      	stosb
 32941 000030DB E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32942                                  blankout:
 32943 000030DD E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32944 000030DF B020                    	mov	al,' '
 32945 000030E1 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32946                                  dsm_exit:
 32947 000030E3 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 32948 000030E4 5E                      	pop	si
 32949 000030E5 1F                      	pop	ds
 32950                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32951                                  	;pop	di
 32952 000030E6 07                      	pop	es
 32953 000030E7 C3                      	retn

 32994 00003114 EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32995                                  sd_ctp:

 33019                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33405                                  ;
 33406                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33407                                  ;
 33408                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33409                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33410                                  ;
 33411                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 33412                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33413                                  ;
 33414                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33415                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33416                                  ;
 33417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33418                                  
 33419                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33420                                  
 33421                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33422                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33423                                  
 33424                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33425                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33426                                  GetHexNum:
 33427 00003220 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33428 00003222 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33429                                  ghn_next:
 33430 00003224 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33431 00003227 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33432 0000322A 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33433 0000322C 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33434 0000322F 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33435 00003231 50                      	push	ax
 33436 00003232 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33437 00003234 E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 33438 00003237 58                      	pop	ax
 33439                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33440 00003238 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33441 0000323B 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33442 0000323D E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33443                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33444                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33445 00003240 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33446                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33447                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33448                                  ghn_shift1:
 33449 00003242 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33450 00003244 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33451 00003246 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33452 00003248 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33453 0000324A 46                      	inc	si
 33454 0000324B EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33455                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33456 0000324D 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33457 00003250 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33458 00003253 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33459 00003257 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33460                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33461                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33462                                  ghn_shift2:

 33464 0000325A D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33465 0000325C D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33466 0000325E E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33467 00003260 F8                      	clc
 33468 00003261 C3                      	retn

 33470                                  ghn_err:
 33471                                  gnib_err:
 33472 00003262 F9                      	stc
 33473                                  ghn_ret:
 33474                                  gnib_ret:
 33475 00003263 C3                      	retn
