 33527                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33528                                  ;
 33529                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33530                                  ;
 33531                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33532                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33533                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33534                                  ;			; DS = data
 33535                                  ;
 33536                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33537                                  ;
 33538                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33539                                  ;
 33540                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33541                                  
 33542                                  umb_insert:
 33543 00003280 1E                      	push	ds
 33544                                  
 33545                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33546                                  	; ds = cs
 33547                                  
 33548                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33549 00003281 8E1E[901F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33550                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33551 00003285 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33552 00003289 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33553 0000328B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33554                                  ui_next:
 33555 0000328D 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33556                                  					;    new block
 33557 0000328F 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33558                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33559                                  					;    last
 33560 00003291 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33561 00003297 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33562                                  					; N: get next block
 33563 00003299 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33564                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33565 0000329B E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33566 0000329E EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33567                                  
 33568                                  ui_insert:
 33569 000032A0 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33570 000032A2 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33571                                  
 33572 000032A3 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33573 000032A5 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33574                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33575 000032A7 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33576                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33577 000032AC C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33578                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33579 000032B2 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33580                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33581 000032B6 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33582                                  
 33583                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33584                                  
 33585 000032BC 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33586 000032BE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33587 000032C4 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33588                                  					; mark as free
 33589 000032CB 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33590                                  					; start & end of new block
 33591 000032CE 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33592                                  
 33593                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33594                                  	
 33595 000032D3 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33596 000032D5 43                      	inc	bx
 33597 000032D6 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33598 000032D8 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33599                                  
 33600                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33601                                  					; this block
 33602 000032D9 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33603                                  	
 33604 000032DB 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33605 000032E1 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33606 000032E8 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33607 000032EC 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33608                                  
 33609 000032F3 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33610                                  
 33611                                  ui_append:
 33612                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33613 000032F5 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33614 000032FA 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33615                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33616                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33617                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33618 00003300 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33619                                  
 33620 00003306 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33621 00003308 40                      	inc	ax
 33622 00003309 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33623                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33624 0000330B F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33625                                  
 33626 0000330D 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33627                                  
 33628 0000330F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33629 00003315 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33630 0000331C 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33631 00003320 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33632                                  
 33633                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33634 00003327 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33635 00003329 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33636 0000332F 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33637                                  					; mark as free
 33638 00003336 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33639 00003337 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33640                                  ui_done:
 33641                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33642 0000333C 1F                      	pop	ds
 33643                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33644                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33645                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 33646 0000333D C3                      	retn

 33649                                  ;
 33650                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 33651                                  ;
 33652                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 33653                                  ;
 33654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33655                                  
 33656                                  AllocUMB:

 33658                                  	; ds = cs
 33659 0000333E E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 33660 00003341 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 33661                                  au_next:
 33662 00003343 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 33663 00003346 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 33664 00003348 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 33665 0000334B EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 33666                                  au_coalesce:
 33667                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33668                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 33669                                  ;au_exit:
 33670                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 33671                                  ;	; ds = cs
 33672                                  ;	retn
 33673                                  
 33674                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33675                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33676                                  
 33677                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33678                                  
 33679                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33680                                  
 33681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33682                                  ;
 33683                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33684                                  ;
 33685                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33686                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33687                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33688                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33689                                  ;
 33690                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33691                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33692                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 33693                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33694                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33695                                  ;
 33696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33697                                  
 33698                                  umb_coalesce:
 33699                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33700                                  	; ds = cs
 33701 0000334D 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33702                                  
 33703 0000334E 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33704

 33715                                  					; N: get next arena

 33725                                  					; Y: coalesce

 33731 00003384 880D                    	mov     [di],cl

 33733

 33787                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33788                                  ;
 33789                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33790                                  ;
 33791                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33792                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33793                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33794                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33795                                  ;				NC
 33796                                  ;			  else 
 33797                                  ;				CY
 33798                                  ;
 33799                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33800                                  ;
 33801                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33802                                  
 33803                                  umb_allocate:
 33804                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33805                                  	; ds = cs

 33807 000033B7 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16

 33809                                  					;   possible
 33810                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33812                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33813                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33814                                  					; the largest UMB
 33815 000033C0 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33816 000033C2 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33817

 33819                                  
 33820                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33823

 33825                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33826                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33827 000033CD 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33828                                  ua_err:
 33829 000033CF F9                      	stc	
 33830                                  
 33831                                  	;clc
 33832                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33833                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33834                                  	; cf=0
 33835                                  	;clc

 33837 000033D0 58                      	pop	ax

 33884                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33885                                  	; ds = cs

 33888

 33898

 33900 000033F2 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33901

 33905                                  	; 09/09/2023

 33911

 33914

 33916

 33919 00003419 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33920                                  					; mark as free

 33929                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33930                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33931

 33933

 33936 00003436 31FF                    	xor	di,di

 33938                                  ; 09/12/2022

 33941 0000343C 740C                    	je	short got_last

 33946 00003446 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 33948                                  	; 09/12/2022

 33950                                  got_last:

 33952                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33953 0000344A 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33954                                  
 33955 0000344F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33956                                  	;clc
 33957                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33958                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33959                                  	; cf=0

 33961 00003455 C3                      	retn
 33962

 33974                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33975                                  ;
 33976                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33977                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33978                                  ;

 33982                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33983                                  	; ds = cs
 33984 00003456 833E[731F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33985                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33986 0000345B 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 33987 0000345D 06                      	push	es
 33988                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33989                                  	;push	bx
 33990                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33991                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33992                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33993                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33994 0000345E 8B1E[771F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33995 00003462 2B1E[731F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33996 00003466 8E06[731F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33997                                  	
 33998 0000346A B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33999 0000346D CD21                    	int	21h
 34000                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34001                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34002                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34003 0000346F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34004 00003471 48                      	dec	ax
 34005 00003472 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34006 00003474 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34007                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34008                                  	;pop	bx
 34009 0000347B 07                      	pop	es

 34024 0000347D 1E                      	push	ds

 34030                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34031 00003486 8E06[901F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34032                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34033 0000348A 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34034 0000348F 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34035                                  ulu_next:
 34036 00003494 E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 34037 00003497 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34038 00003499 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34039 0000349B 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34040 0000349D 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34041 0000349F EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34042                                  ulu_found:
 34043                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34044 000034A1 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34045                                  ulu_x:
 34046 000034A6 07                      	pop	es
 34047 000034A7 1F                      	pop	ds

 34050                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34051                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34052                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34053                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34054                                  
 34055                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34056                                  ;
 34057                                  ; Summary:
 34058                                  ;
 34059                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34060                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34061                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34062                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34063                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34064                                  ;
 34065                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34066                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34067                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34068                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34069                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34070                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34071                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34072                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34073                                  ;
 34074                                  ; Example:
 34075                                  ;
 34076                                  ;   [menu]
 34077                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34078                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34079                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34080                                  ;
 34081                                  ;   [network]
 34082                                  ;   include misc
 34083                                  ;   device=foo
 34084                                  ;
 34085                                  ;   [misc]
 34086                                  ;   device=bar
 34087                                  ;   include alternate
 34088                                  ;
 34089                                  ;   [alternate]
 34090                                  ;   device=tar
 34091                                  ;
 34092                                  ;
 34093                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34094                                  ;
 34095                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34096                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34097                                  ;
 34098                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34099                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34100                                  ;   following order:
 34101                                  ;
 34102                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34103                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34104                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34105                                  ;
 34106                                  
 34107                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34108                                  
 34109                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34110                                  
 34111                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34112                                  
 34113                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34114                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34115                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34116                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34117                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34118                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34119                                  
 34120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34121                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34122                                  
 34123                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34124                                  
 34125                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34126                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34127                                  
 34128 000034A9 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34129

 34168                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 34169 000034C7 A0[5148]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34170 000034CA 8A0E[6549]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34171                                  ;

 34173                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34174                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h

 34177                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34178                                  ;

 34183                                  ;
 34184                                  ;	; 27/07/2023

 34186                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4

 34189                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 34190                                  ;

 34192                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34193                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 34194                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34195                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34196                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 34197                                  
 34198 000034CE BA7000                  	mov	dx,DOSBIODATASEG
 34199 000034D1 8EDA                    	mov	ds,dx
 34200

 34202 000034D6 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35
 34203                                  
 34204                                  	;mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 34205                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive

 34354                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34355                                  ;
 34356                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34357                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34358                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34359                                  ; error.

 34363                                  ; 09/09/2023

 34629                                  ;
 34630                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34631                                  ;
 34632                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34633                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34634                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34635                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34636                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34637                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34638                                  ;
 34639                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34640                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34641                                  ;
 34642                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34643                                  ;
 34644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34645                                  
 34646                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34647                                  
 34648                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34649                                  
 34650                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34651                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 34652                                  
 34653                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34654                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 34655                                  
 34656                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34657                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34658                                  	; ds = cs
 34659                                  
 34660 000035CE 06                      	push	es
 34661

 34663 000035D0 07                      	pop	es

 34739                                  
 34740                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34741                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34742                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34743                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34744                                  
 34745                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34746                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34747                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 34752 0000362E 7502                    	jne	short not_144m

 34755

 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35357                                  ;
 35358                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35359                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35360                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35361                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35362                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35363                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35364                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35365                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35366                                  ;
 35367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35368                                  
 35369                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35370                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35371                                  
 35372                                  skip_comment:
 35373 00003876 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35374                                  
 35375                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35376                                  	; ds = cs	
 35377                                  
 35378 00003878 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35379                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35380 0000387D 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35381                                  
 35382 0000387F 803E[4F03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35383                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35384 00003884 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35385                                  
 35386 00003886 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35387                                  	
 35388 00003889 3806[5003]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35389                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35390 0000388D 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35391                                  
 35392 0000388F 803E[4F03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35393                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35394 00003894 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35395                                  
 35396 00003896 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35397                                  	
 35398 0000389A 3806[5103]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35399                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35400 0000389E 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35401                                  skip_cmmt:
 35402 000038A0 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35403 000038A2 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35404 000038A5 46                      	inc	si
 35405 000038A6 49                      	dec	cx
 35406 000038A7 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35407 000038A9 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35408                                  no_commt:
 35409 000038AB C3                      	retn

 35420                                  ;
 35421                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35422                                  ;
 35423                                  ;   INPUT
 35424                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35425                                  ;
 35426                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35427                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35430                                  ;       All
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;   HISTORY
 35433                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35434                                  ;
 35435                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35436                                  
 35437                                  kbd_read:
 35438 000038AC F606[0947]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35439 000038B1 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35440                                  
 35441 000038B3 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35442 000038B4 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35443 000038B6 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35444                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35445                                  kbd_loop:
 35446 000038B8 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35447 000038BA CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35448 000038BC 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35449 000038BE B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35450 000038C0 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35451 000038C2 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35452 000038C4 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35453 000038C6 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35454                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35455                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35456 000038C9 2E2B06[8403]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35457                                  
 35458 000038CE 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35459 000038D0 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35460                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35461 000038D2 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35462                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35463 000038D3 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35464 000038D5 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35465 000038D7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35466 000038D9 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35467 000038DB 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35468 000038DD 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35469 000038DE 43                              inc     bx
 35470                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35471 000038DF 800E[0D47]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35472                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35473 000038E4 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35474 000038E6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35475 000038E8 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35476 000038EA 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35477 000038EC 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35478                                  
 35479                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35480 000038EE 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35481 000038F1 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35482                                  	
 35483 000038F3 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35484 000038F6 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35485                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35486 000038F8 BA[A14B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35487 000038FB E8DD0B                          call    print
 35488                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35489 000038FE 800E[0D47]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35490 00003903 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35491                                  kbd_notf5:
 35492                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35493 00003905 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35494 00003908 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35495                                  
 35496 0000390A 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35497 0000390D 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35498                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35499 0000390F BA[DF4B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35500 00003912 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 35501 00003915 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35502 00003917 881E[0D47]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35503                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35504 0000391B B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35505 0000391D CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35506 0000391F C606[1347]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35507 00003924 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35508 00003926 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35509                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35510 00003928 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35511 0000392B 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35512                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35513 0000392D E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35514 00003930 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35515 00003931 C3                              retn			;
 35516                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35517 00003932 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35518 00003933 C3                              retn			;

 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;   INPUT
 35525                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35526                                  ;
 35527                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35528                                  ;       None
 35529                                  ;
 35530                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35531                                  ;       None
 35532                                  ;
 35533                                  ;   HISTORY
 35534                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35535                                  ;
 35536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35537                                  
 35538                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35539                                  
 35540                                  set_numlock:
 35541                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35542                                  	;push	ax
 35543 00003934 1E                              push    ds
 35544 00003935 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35545 00003937 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35546 00003939 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35547 0000393C 2E3B06[7C4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35548 00003941 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35549 00003943 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35550 00003948 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35551                                  not_off:
 35552 0000394A 2E3B06[7A4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35553 0000394F F9                              stc
 35554 00003950 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35555 00003952 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35556                                  set_done:
 35557 00003957 1F                              pop     ds
 35558                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35559                                  	;pop	ax
 35560 00003958 C3                              retn
 35561                                  
 35562                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35563                                  
 35564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35565                                  ;
 35566                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;   INPUT
 35569                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35570                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35571                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35572                                  ;
 35573                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35574                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35575                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35576                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35577                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35580                                  ;       All
 35581                                  ;
 35582                                  ;   NOTES
 35583                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35584                                  ;
 35585                                  ;   HISTORY
 35586                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35587                                  ;
 35588                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35589                                  
 35590                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35591                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 35592                                  
 35593                                  menu_check:
 35594                                  
 35595                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 35596                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35597                                  
 35598 00003959 51                              push    cx              ;
 35599 0000395A 56                              push    si              ;
 35600 0000395B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35601                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35602 0000395D E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35603 00003960 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35604 00003962 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 35605 00003964 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35606 00003966 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35607 00003967 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35608                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35609 00003969 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35610 0000396B 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35611 0000396D 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35612 0000396F 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35613 00003971 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35614 00003974 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35615 00003979 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35616                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35617 0000397B 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35618 0000397D 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35619                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35620 0000397F E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35621                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35622 00003982 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35623 00003984 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35624 00003986 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35625 00003988 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35626 0000398A E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 35627 0000398D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35628 0000398F 3A06[BF1E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35629 00003993 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35630 00003995 800E[0947]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35631 0000399A EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35632                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35633 0000399C 3A06[CB1E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35634 000039A0 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35635 000039A2 800E[0947]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35636 000039A7 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35637                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;

 35640                                  swchk_end:                      ;

 35648 000039B5 7508                            jnz	short menu_search

 35650                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35651                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer

 35669                                  menu_color:

 35671 000039D2 52                      	push	dx              ;

 35673                                  	; 10/09/2023
 35674                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 35675 000039D3 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 35676 000039D6 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35677 000039D9 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35678                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 35679                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 35680                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 35681                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023

 35684 000039E0 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done

 35686 000039E5 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)

 35695 000039F2 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no

 35702

 35718

 35720

 35754 00003A51 803E[1347]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0

 35763                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35764 00003A6A 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 35765 00003A6C B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)

 35770                                  
 35771                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35772                                  
 35773                                  menu_item:
 35774                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023

 35777 00003A79 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for

 35783                                  
 35784                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35785                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI

 35790 00003A87 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets

 35793

 35814                                  menu_getdefault:
 35815 00003AAF 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35816 00003AB1 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes

 35818 00003AB5 E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35819                                  menu_valid:

 35821 00003ABA 8816[0F47]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35822 00003ABE 8B3E[1047]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35823 00003AC2 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35824 00003AC4 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35825 00003AC6 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35826                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35827 00003AC7 53                              push    bx              ;
 35828 00003AC8 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35829 00003ACA 8BB7[1E47]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35830 00003ACE B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35831 00003AD1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35832 00003AD2 06                              push    es              ;
 35833 00003AD3 1F                              pop     ds              ;

 35835 00003AD7 1F                              pop     ds              ;

 35838 00003ADB 43                              inc     bx              ;

 35840 00003AE0 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35841                                  menu_nodefault:

 35843                                  menu_setdefault:
 35844 00003AE4 881E[0E47]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35845                                  
 35846                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35847                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35848                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35849                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35850                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35851                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35852

 35854 00003AED 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no

 35865 00003AFF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35866 00003B01 06                              push    es              ;
 35867 00003B02 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35868 00003B05 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35869 00003B07 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the

 35878                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35879 00003B23 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35880 00003B28 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;

 35882 00003B2A 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]

 35884 00003B31 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35885 00003B33 8A36[0847]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35886                                  menu_clear:

 35888 00003B39 07                              pop     es              ;

 35892

 35894 00003B49 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35895 00003B4B 8A3E[0547]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;

 35897 00003B53 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35898 00003B55 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35899 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35900 00003B59 BA[684C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35901 00003B5C E87C09                          call    print           ;

 35903 00003B61 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35904 00003B63 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35905 00003B66 8816[0747]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35906                                  
 35907                                  menu_nostatus:
 35908 00003B6A BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35909                                  menu_disploop:
 35910 00003B6D E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35911 00003B70 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35912 00003B71 3A1E[0F47]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35913 00003B75 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35914                                  
 35915                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35916                                  
 35917 00003B77 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35918 00003B79 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;

 35920 00003B7E 8A3E[0547]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35921 00003B82 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35922 00003B84 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35923

 35927 00003B8F BA[284A]                        mov     dx,crlfm

 35932 00003BA1 8F06[0947]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35933                                  
 35934                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35935                                  
 35936                                  menu_autoselect:
 35937 00003BA5 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 35938 00003BA8 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35939 00003BAA E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35940                                  menu_abort:

 35942 00003BAF E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35943                                  
 35944                                  normal_boot:
 35945 00003BB2 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 35946 00003BB5 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no

 35948 00003BBB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;

 35950                                  
 35951                                  not_topmenu:
 35952 00003BC0 80BF[1447]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35953 00003BC5 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 35954 00003BC7 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 35955 00003BC9 8BBF[1E47]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35956 00003BCD E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35957 00003BD0 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 35958 00003BD2 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35959 00003BD4 E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 35960                                  
 35961                                  not_submenu:
 35962 00003BD7 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35963 00003BD9 8B9F[1E47]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35964                                  
 35965                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35966                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35967                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35968                                  
 35969                                  no_selection:
