 35971 00003BE1 8B0E[5403]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35972 00003BE5 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 35973 00003BE7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 35974 00003BE8 8E1E[BC14]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35975 00003BEC 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 35976                                  
 35977                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35978                                  ;
 35979                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35980                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35981                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35982                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 35983                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35984                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35987                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35988                                  
 35989                                  copyblock_loop:
 35990 00003BEE 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35991 00003BEF E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35992 00003BF2 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35993 00003BF3 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35994                                  
 35995                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 35996                                  
 35997                                  copyblock_begin:
 35998                                  
 35999                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36000                                  %if 0
 36001                                          push    ax              ;
 36002                                          push    cx              ;
 36003                                          push    si              ;
 36004                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36005                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36006                                          push    ds              ;
 36007                                          push    cs              ;
 36008                                          pop     ds              ;
 36009                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36010                                          pop     ds              ;
 36011                                          pop     di              ;
 36012                                          pop     si              ;
 36013                                          pop     cx              ;
 36014                                          pop     ax              ;
 36015                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36016                                  %endif
 36017                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36018 00003BF5 57                      	push	di
 36019 00003BF6 BF[5347]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36020 00003BF9 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36021 00003BFC 5F                      	pop	di
 36022 00003BFD 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36023                                  
 36024 00003BFF 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36025 00003C01 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36026 00003C03 57                              push    di              ;
 36027 00003C04 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36028 00003C06 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36029 00003C07 06                              push    es              ;
 36030 00003C08 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36031 00003C09 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36032 00003C0C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36033 00003C0D 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36034                                  copyblock_check:
 36035 00003C0E 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36036 00003C10 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36037 00003C12 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36038 00003C15 EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36039                                  
 36040                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36041 00003C17 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36042 00003C1A E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36043 00003C1D 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36044 00003C1F 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36045 00003C21 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36046 00003C23 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36047 00003C25 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36048                                  ;
 36049                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36050                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36051                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36052                                  ;
 36053                                  move_config:
 36054 00003C27 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36055 00003C29 51                              push    cx              ;
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36058                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36059                                  ;
 36060                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36061 00003C2A B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36062 00003C2D BE[4647]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36063 00003C30 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36064                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36065                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36066                                  copy_boot: 
 36067                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36068 00003C31 2E                              cs
 36069 00003C32 AC                      	lodsb
 36070 00003C33 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36071 00003C35 47                              inc     di              ;
 36072 00003C36 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36073                                  
 36074 00003C38 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36075                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36076                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36077 00003C39 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36078 00003C3B 2E8B36[1047]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36079 00003C40 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36080 00003C42 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36081 00003C44 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36082 00003C45 07                              pop     es              ;
 36083 00003C46 BE[5347]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36084 00003C49 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36085 00003C4C E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36086 00003C4F 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36087 00003C51 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36088 00003C53 46                              inc     si              ;
 36089 00003C54 47                              inc     di              ;
 36090 00003C55 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36091 00003C57 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36092 00003C5A 07                              pop     es              ;
 36093                                  
 36094                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36095                                  
 36096 00003C5B 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36097 00003C5D 2E893E[BA14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36098 00003C62 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36099 00003C64 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36100                                  
 36101 00003C65 51                              push    cx              ;
 36102 00003C66 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36103 00003C68 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36104 00003C69 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36105 00003C6B 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36106                                  
 36107                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36108                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36109                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36110                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36111                                  ;   is empty.
 36112                                  
 36113 00003C6C 06                              push    es              ;
 36114 00003C6D 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36115 00003C6F 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36116 00003C70 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36117 00003C76 E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36118 00003C79 07                              pop     es
 36119                                  
 36120                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36121                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36122                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36123                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36124                                  
 36125                                  menu_done:
 36126 00003C7A 803E[0547]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36127 00003C7F 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36128 00003C81 06                              push    es              ;
 36129 00003C82 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36130 00003C85 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36131 00003C87 A1[0B47]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36132 00003C8A 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36133 00003C8E A0[0A47]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36134 00003C91 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36135 00003C95 07                              pop     es              ;
 36136                                  menu_exit:
 36137 00003C96 890E[5403]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36138 00003C9A 890E[5603]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36139                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36140                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36141                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36142                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36143 00003C9E C3                      	retn
 36144                                  
 36145                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36146                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36147                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36148                                  
 36149                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36150                                  ;
 36151                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36152                                  ;
 36153                                  ;   INPUT
 36154                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36155                                  ;
 36156                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36157                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36158                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36159                                  ;
 36160                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36161                                  ;       None
 36162                                  ;
 36163                                  ;   NOTES
 36164                                  ;       None
 36165                                  ;
 36166                                  ;   HISTORY
 36167                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36168                                  ;
 36169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36170                                  
 36171                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36172                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36173                                  
 36174                                  copy_envvar:
 36175 00003C9F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36176 00003CA0 56                              push    si              ;
 36177 00003CA1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36178 00003CA2 06                              push    es              ;
 36179 00003CA3 06                              push    es              ;
 36180 00003CA4 8E06[BC14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36181 00003CA8 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36182                                  
 36183                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36184                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36185                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36186                                  ;
 36187                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36188                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36189                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36190                                  
 36191 00003CA9 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36192                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36193 00003CAB AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36194 00003CAC 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36195                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36196 00003CAE 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36197 00003CB0 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36198                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36199 00003CB2 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36200 00003CB4 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36201                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36202 00003CB6 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36203 00003CB8 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36204 00003CB9 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36205 00003CBB 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36206 00003CBD B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36207 00003CBF 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36208 00003CC1 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36209 00003CC3 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36210 00003CC4 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36211                                  copy_varsrch:
 36212 00003CC6 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36213 00003CC9 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36214 00003CCB 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36215 00003CCD 51                              push    cx              ;
 36216 00003CCE 56                              push    si              ;
 36217 00003CCF F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36218 00003CD1 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36219 00003CD2 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36220 00003CD3 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36221 00003CD5 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36222 00003CD9 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36223                                  
 36224                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36225                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36226                                  
 36227 00003CDB B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36228 00003CDE F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36229 00003CE0 56                              push    si              ;
 36230 00003CE1 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36231 00003CE3 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36232 00003CE5 2E8B0E[BA14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36233 00003CEA 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36234                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36235                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36236                                  
 36237 00003CEC F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36238 00003CED 26                      	es	; 26h
 36239 00003CEE A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36240                                  
 36241 00003CEF 5E                      	pop     si
 36242                                  copy_envprep:
 36243 00003CF0 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36244 00003CF3 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36245 00003CF5 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36246 00003CF8 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36247                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36248                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36249                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36250 00003CFA AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36251 00003CFB 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36252 00003CFD 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36253 00003CFF 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36254 00003D01 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36255 00003D03 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36256 00003D04 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36257                                  
 36258                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36259 00003D06 51                              push    cx              ;
 36260 00003D07 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36261 00003D0A F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36262 00003D0C 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36263 00003D0D EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36264                                  
 36265                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36266                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36267                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36268                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36269                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36270                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36271                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36272                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36273                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36274                                  
 36275                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36276 00003D0F 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36277 00003D11 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36278                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36279 00003D12 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36280 00003D15 2E893E[BA14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36281                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36282 00003D1A F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36283                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36284 00003D1B F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36285 00003D1C 07                              pop     es              ;
 36286 00003D1D 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36287 00003D1E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36288 00003D1F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36289                                  
 36290                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36291 00003D20 C3                              retn
 36292                                  
 36293                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36294                                  ;
 36295                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36296                                  ;
 36297                                  ;   INPUT
 36298                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36299                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36300                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36301                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36302                                  ;
 36303                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36304                                  ;       Same as above
 36305                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36306                                  ;
 36307                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36308                                  ;       All
 36309                                  ;
 36310                                  ;   NOTES
 36311                                  ;       None
 36312                                  ;
 36313                                  ;   HISTORY
 36314                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36315                                  ;
 36316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36317                                  
 36318                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36319                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36320                                  
 36321                                  copy_block:
 36322 00003D21 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36323 00003D24 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36324 00003D26 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36325 00003D28 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36326 00003D2A 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36327                                  
 36328 00003D2C 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36329 00003D2E 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36330 00003D30 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36331                                  
 36332                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36333                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36334                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36335                                  
 36336 00003D32 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36337 00003D37 57                              push    di              ;
 36338                                  
 36339 00003D38 BF[4E47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36340 00003D3B E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36341 00003D3E 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36342                                  
 36343 00003D40 BF[5347]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36344 00003D43 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36345 00003D46 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36346                                  
 36347 00003D48 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36348 00003D4A E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36349 00003D4D 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36350                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36351                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36352 00003D4F 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36353 00003D51 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36354 00003D52 51                              push    cx              ;
 36355 00003D53 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36356 00003D55 56                              push    si              ;
 36357 00003D56 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36358 00003D57 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36359 00003D59 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36360 00003D5C E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36361 00003D5F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36362 00003D60 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36363 00003D61 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36364 00003D63 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36365                                  
 36366                                  copy_error:
 36367                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36368 00003D65 F8                      	clc
 36369                                  copy_skip:
 36370 00003D66 5F                              pop     di
 36371                                  ;copy_error:
 36372                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36373                                  	;clc                    ;
 36374 00003D67 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36375 00003D6A EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36376                                  
 36377                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36378                                  
 36379                                  copy_line:
 36380 00003D6C 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36381 00003D6E 47                              inc     di              ;
 36382 00003D6F 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36383 00003D71 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36384 00003D73 2E803E[BF14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36385 00003D79 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36386 00003D7B E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36387 00003D7E 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36388 00003D80 47                              inc     di              ;
 36389 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 36390 00003D82 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36391                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36392 00003D84 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36393 00003D87 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36394 00003D89 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36395 00003D8B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36396                                  copy_next:
 36397 00003D8C 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36398 00003D8E 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36399                                  
 36400                                  copy_nextline:
 36401 00003D90 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36402 00003D93 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36403                                  
 36404                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36405                                  ;copy_done:
 36406                                          ;retn
 36407                                  
 36408                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36409                                  ;
 36410                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36411                                  ;
 36412                                  ;   INPUT
 36413                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36414                                  ;
 36415                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36416                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36417                                  ;
 36418                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36419                                  ;       DX
 36420                                  ;
 36421                                  ;   NOTES
 36422                                  ;       None
 36423                                  ;
 36424                                  ;   HISTORY
 36425                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36426                                  ;
 36427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36428                                  
 36429                                  get_linenum:
 36430 00003D95 50                              push    ax              ;
 36431 00003D96 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36432 00003D98 51                              push    cx              ;
 36433 00003D99 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36434 00003D9B 56                              push    si              ;
 36435 00003D9C 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36436 00003DA1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36437                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36438 00003DA3 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36439 00003DA6 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36440 00003DA8 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36441 00003DA9 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36442 00003DAB 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36443                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36444 00003DAD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36445 00003DAE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36446 00003DAF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36447 00003DB0 C3                              retn
 36448                                  
 36449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36450                                  ;
 36451                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36452                                  ;
 36453                                  ;   INPUT
 36454                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36455                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36456                                  ;
 36457                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36458                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36459                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36460                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36461                                  ;
 36462                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36463                                  ;       None
 36464                                  ;
 36465                                  ;   NOTES
 36466                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36467                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36468                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36469                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36470                                  ;
 36471                                  ;   HISTORY
 36472                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36473                                  ;
 36474                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36475                                  
 36476                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36477 00003DB1 50                              push    ax              ;
 36478 00003DB2 51                              push    cx              ;
 36479 00003DB3 2E8B0E[5403]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36480 00003DB8 56                              push    si              ;
 36481 00003DB9 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36482 00003DBB 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36483 00003DBC 06                              push    es              ;
 36484 00003DBD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36485 00003DBE E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36486 00003DC1 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36487 00003DC3 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36488 00003DC5 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36489 00003DC6 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36490 00003DC7 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36491 00003DC8 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36492                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36493 00003DC9 C3                              retn			;
 36494                                  
 36495                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36496                                  ;
 36497                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36498                                  ;
 36499                                  ;   INPUT
 36500                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36501                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36502                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36503                                  ;
 36504                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36505                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36506                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36507                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36508                                  ;
 36509                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36510                                  ;       AX
 36511                                  ;
 36512                                  ;   NOTES
 36513                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36514                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36515                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36516                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36517                                  ;
 36518                                  ;   HISTORY
 36519                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36520                                  ;
 36521                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36522                                  
 36523                                  find_block:
 36524 00003DCA E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36525 00003DCD 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36526 00003DCF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36527 00003DD1 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36528 00003DD3 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 36529 00003DD5 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36530 00003DD7 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 36531 00003DD9 2E800E[BF14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36532 00003DDF EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 36533                                  check_line:
 36534 00003DE1 2E800E[BF14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36535 00003DE7 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36536 00003DEA 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36537                                  next_line:
 36538 00003DEC E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36539 00003DEF EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 36540                                  ;find_exit:
 36541                                  ;	retn
 36542                                  
 36543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36544                                  ;
 36545                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36546                                  ;
 36547                                  ;   INPUT
 36548                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36549                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36550                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36551                                  ;
 36552                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36553                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36554                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36555                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36556                                  ;
 36557                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36558                                  ;       AX
 36559                                  ;
 36560                                  ;   NOTES
 36561                                  ;       None
 36562                                  ;
 36563                                  ;   HISTORY
 36564                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36565                                  ;
 36566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36567                                  
 36568                                  comp_names:
 36569 00003DF1 57                              push    di              ;
 36570                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36571 00003DF2 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 36572 00003DF5 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 36573 00003DF7 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36574 00003DFA 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36575 00003DFC 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36576 00003DFE 47                              inc     di              ;
 36577 00003DFF 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36578                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36579 00003E02 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36580 00003E04 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36581 00003E06 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36582                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36583 00003E07 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36584 00003E08 C3                              retn			;
 36585                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36586 00003E09 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36587 00003E0B E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36588 00003E0E 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36589 00003E10 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36590                                  
 36591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36592                                  
 36593                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36594                                  comp_names_x:
 36595                                  	;
 36596                                  comp_names_safe:
 36597 00003E12 50                              push    ax
 36598 00003E13 51                              push    cx
 36599 00003E14 56                              push	si
 36600 00003E15 1E                              push    ds
 36601 00003E16 0E                              push    cs
 36602 00003E17 1F                              pop     ds
 36603 00003E18 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 36604 00003E1B 1F                              pop     ds
 36605 00003E1C 5E                      	pop	si
 36606 00003E1D 59                              pop     cx
 36607 00003E1E 58                              pop     ax
 36608 00003E1F C3                              retn
 36609                                  
 36610                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36611                                  ;
 36612                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 36613                                  ;
 36614                                  ;   INPUT
 36615                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36616                                  ;
 36617                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36618                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36619                                  ;
 36620                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36621                                  ;       None
 36622                                  ;
 36623                                  ;   NOTES
 36624                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36625                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36626                                  ;
 36627                                  ;   HISTORY
 36628                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36629                                  ;
 36630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36631                                  
 36632                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36633                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 36634                                  
 36635                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36636 00003E20 50                              push    ax              ;
 36637 00003E21 53                              push    bx              ;
 36638 00003E22 51                              push    cx              ;
 36639 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ;
 36640 00003E24 56                              push    si              ;
 36641 00003E25 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36642 00003E27 8A3E[0547]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36643 00003E2B CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36644 00003E2D 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 36645 00003E2E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36646 00003E30 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36647 00003E32 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 36648 00003E35 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 36649 00003E37 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36650 00003E39 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36651 00003E3B 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36652 00003E3D 8A26[0447]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36653 00003E41 3A1E[0E47]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36654 00003E45 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36655 00003E47 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36656 00003E4A 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 36657 00003E4C B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 36658 00003E4E D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 36659 00003E50 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36660 00003E52 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 36661 00003E54 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36662                                  print_other:                    ;
 36663 00003E57 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 36664 00003E59 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36665 00003E5B 8BBF[3247]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36666 00003E5F 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36667 00003E61 8A3E[0547]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36668 00003E65 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36669 00003E67 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36670 00003E6A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36671 00003E6C FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36672 00003E6E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36673 00003E70 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36674                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36675 00003E72 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36676 00003E75 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36677 00003E77 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36678 00003E79 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36679 00003E7B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36680                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36681 00003E7D B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 36682 00003E80 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36683 00003E82 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36684 00003E84 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36685 00003E86 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36686 00003E88 06                              push    es              ;
 36687                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36688 00003E89 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36689 00003E8C 47                              inc     di              ;
 36690 00003E8D 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36691 00003E8F 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 36692 00003E91 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 36693                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36694 00003E93 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 36695 00003E95 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36696 00003E97 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36697 00003E99 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36698 00003E9B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36699 00003E9D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36700 00003E9F FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 36701 00003EA1 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36702 00003EA4 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 36703 00003EA6 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36704 00003EA8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36705 00003EAA EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 36706                                  print_done:                     ;
 36707 00003EAC 07                              pop     es              ;
 36708 00003EAD 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36709 00003EAE B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 36710 00003EB0 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36711 00003EB2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36712 00003EB3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 36713 00003EB4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36714 00003EB5 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36715 00003EB6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36716 00003EB7 C3                              retn			;
 36717                                  
 36718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36719                                  ;
 36720                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36721                                  ;
 36722                                  ;   INPUT
 36723                                  ;       None
 36724                                  ;
 36725                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36726                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36727                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36728                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36729                                  ;
 36730                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36731                                  ;       None
 36732                                  ;
 36733                                  ;   NOTES
 36734                                  ;       None
 36735                                  ;
 36736                                  ;   HISTORY
 36737                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36738                                  ;
 36739                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36740                                  
 36741                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36742 00003EB8 8A1E[0E47]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36743 00003EBC 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36744 00003EBE E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 36745 00003EC1 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36746 00003EC4 803E[1247]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36747 00003EC9 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36748 00003ECB B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36749 00003ECD CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36750 00003ECF 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36751                                  check_time:
 36752 00003ED1 A0[1247]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36753 00003ED4 2A06[1347]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36754 00003ED8 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 36755 00003EDA 800E[0D47]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 36756 00003EDF C606[1347]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36757 00003EE4 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36758                                  show_time:
 36759 00003EE7 53                              push    bx              ;
 36760 00003EE8 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36761 00003EEA 8A3E[0547]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36762 00003EEE B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36763 00003EF0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36764 00003EF2 52                              push    dx              ;
 36765 00003EF3 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36766 00003EF6 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36767 00003EF8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36768 00003EFA BA[C84C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36769 00003EFD E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36770 00003F00 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36771 00003F02 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36772 00003F03 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 36773 00003F05 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36774 00003F07 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 36775 00003F09 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36776 00003F0B B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36777 00003F0D CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36778 00003F0F 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 36779 00003F11 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 36780 00003F13 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36781 00003F15 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36782 00003F17 5A                              pop     dx
 36783 00003F18 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36784 00003F1A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36785 00003F1C 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36786                                  input_key:
 36787 00003F1D B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36788 00003F1F B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36789 00003F21 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 36790 00003F23 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 36791 00003F25 803E[1247]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36792 00003F2A 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36793 00003F2C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36794 00003F2E CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36795 00003F30 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 36796 00003F32 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36797 00003F34 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 36798 00003F36 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 36799 00003F38 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36800                                  got_time:
 36801 00003F3A 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36802 00003F3C 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 36803 00003F3E 0036[1347]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36804 00003F42 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 36805                                  got_key:
 36806 00003F44 50                              push    ax              ;
 36807 00003F45 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36808 00003F48 8706[1247]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36809 00003F4C 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36810 00003F4E 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36811 00003F50 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36812 00003F51 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36813 00003F54 8B1E[0447]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36814 00003F58 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36815 00003F5B CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36816 00003F5D 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 36817                                  
 36818                                  timeout_disabled:
 36819 00003F5E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36820 00003F5F 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36821 00003F61 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36822 00003F63 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36823 00003F65 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36824                                  
 36825 00003F67 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36826 00003F69 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 36827 00003F6B 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36828 00003F6E 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36829 00003F70 FE0E[0E47]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36830 00003F74 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36831 00003F77 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36832 00003F79 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 36833                                  not_up:
 36834 00003F7B 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36835 00003F7D 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 36836 00003F7F 3A1E[0F47]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36837 00003F83 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36838 00003F85 FE06[0E47]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36839 00003F89 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36840 00003F8C 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36841                                  print1: 
 36842 00003F8D 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 36843                                  print2: 
 36844 00003F8F E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 36845 00003F92 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 36846                                  to_input_key:
 36847 00003F95 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 36848                                  not_down:
 36849 00003F97 F606[0947]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36850 00003F9C 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36851 00003F9E 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36852 00003FA0 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 36853 00003FA2 8036[0D47]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36854 00003FA7 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 36855 00003FAA E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 36856                                  not_f8:
 36857 00003FAD 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36858 00003FAF 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36859                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 36860                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 36861                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 36862 00003FB1 800E[0D47]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 36863 00003FB6 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36864 00003FB9 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36865 00003FBB EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36866                                  
 36867                                  normal_key:
 36868 00003FBD 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36869 00003FBF 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 36870 00003FC1 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36871 00003FC3 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36872 00003FC5 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36873 00003FC8 C3                              retn			;
 36874                                  not_backspace:
 36875 00003FC9 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36876 00003FCB 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36877 00003FCD 3A06[0F47]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36878 00003FD1 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36879 00003FD3 A2[0E47]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36880 00003FD6 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36881 00003FD9 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36882 00003FDB EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 36883                                  
 36884                                  select_done:
 36885 00003FDD B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36886 00003FDF 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 36887 00003FE1 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36888                                  
 36889                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36890                                  
 36891                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36892                                  
 36893                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36894                                  ;
 36895                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 36896                                  ;
 36897                                  ;   INPUT
 36898                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36899                                  ;
 36900                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36901                                  ;       None
 36902                                  ;
 36903                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36904                                  ;       None
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   NOTES
 36907                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36908                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36909                                  ;
 36910                                  ;   HISTORY
 36911                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36912                                  ;
 36913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36914                                  
 36915                                  disp_input:
 36916 00003FE3 50                      	push	ax
 36917                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 36918                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 36919                                  	;mov	al,' '
 36920                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 36921 00003FE4 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 36922 00003FE6 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 36923 00003FE8 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 36924                                  disp_ok:
 36925 00003FEA 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 36926                                  disp_input_ok:
 36927 00003FEC B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36928 00003FEE CD21                    	int	21h
 36929 00003FF0 BA[284A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 36930 00003FF3 E8E504                  	call	print
 36931 00003FF6 58                      	pop	ax
 36932 00003FF7 C3                      	retn
 36933                                  
 36934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36935                                  
 36936                                  disp_num:
 36937 00003FF8 53                              push    bx
 36938 00003FF9 0430                            add     al,'0'
 36939 00003FFB B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 36940 00003FFD 8B1E[0447]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36941 00004001 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 36942 00004004 CD10                            int     10h
 36943 00004006 5B                              pop     bx
 36944 00004007 C3                              retn
 36945                                  
 36946                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36947                                  ;
 36948                                  ;   show_status: display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36949                                  ;
 36950                                  ;   INPUT
 36951                                  ;       None
 36952                                  ;
 36953                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36954                                  ;       None
 36955                                  ;
 36956                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36957                                  ;       None
 36958                                  ;
 36959                                  ;   NOTES
 36960                                  ;       None
 36961                                  ;
 36962                                  ;   HISTORY
 36963                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36964                                  ;
 36965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36966                                  
 36967                                  show_status:
 36968 00004008 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36969 00004009 8B1E[0447]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 36984                                  show_onoff: 
 36985 0000402B CD10                            int     10h
 36986                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36987                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
