 37008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37009                                  ;
 37010                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37011                                  ;
 37012                                  ;   INPUT
 37013                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37014                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37015                                  ;
 37016                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37017                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37018                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37019                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37020                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37021                                  ;
 37022                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37023                                  ;       AX
 37024                                  ;
 37025                                  ;   NOTES
 37026                                  ;       None
 37027                                  ;
 37028                                  ;   HISTORY
 37029                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37030                                  ;
 37031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37032                                  
 37033                                  skip_token:
 37034 00004045 E84D00                          call    get_char
 37035 00004048 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37036 0000404A E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37037 0000404D 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37038                                  skip_check_eol:
 37039 0000404F 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37040 00004051 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37041 00004053 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37042 00004055 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37043 00004057 F8                              clc
 37044                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37045 00004058 C3                      	retn
 37046                                  skip_token_eol:
 37047 00004059 F9                              stc
 37048                                  skip_token_done:
 37049 0000405A C3                              retn
 37050                                  
 37051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37052                                  ;
 37053                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37054                                  ;
 37055                                  ;   INPUT
 37056                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37057                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37058                                  ;
 37059                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37060                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37061                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37062                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37063                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37064                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37065                                  ;
 37066                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37067                                  ;       AX
 37068                                  ;
 37069                                  ;   NOTES
 37070                                  ;       None
 37071                                  ;
 37072                                  ;   HISTORY
 37073                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37074                                  ;
 37075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37076                                  
 37077                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37078 0000405B E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37079 0000405E 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37080 00004061 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37081 00004063 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37082 00004066 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37083 00004068 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37084                                  
 37085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37086                                  ;
 37087                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37088                                  ;
 37089                                  ;   INPUT
 37090                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37091                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37092                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37093                                  ;
 37094                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37095                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37096                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37097                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37098                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37099                                  ;
 37100                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37101                                  ;       AX
 37102                                  ;
 37103                                  ;   NOTES
 37104                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37105                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37106                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37107                                  ;
 37108                                  ;   HISTORY
 37109                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37110                                  ;
 37111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37112                                  
 37113                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37114                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37115                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37116                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37117                                       
 37118                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37119                                  
 37120                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37121                                  ;
 37122                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37123                                  ;
 37124                                  ;   INPUT
 37125                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37126                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37127                                  ;
 37128                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37129                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37130                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37131                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37132                                  ;
 37133                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37134                                  ;       AX
 37135                                  ;
 37136                                  ;   NOTES
 37137                                  ;       None
 37138                                  ;
 37139                                  ;   HISTORY
 37140                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37141                                  ;
 37142                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37143                                  
 37144                                  skip_line:
 37145 0000406A E82800                          call    get_char
 37146 0000406D 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37147                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37148 0000406F 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37149 00004071 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37150                                  skip_line_done:
 37151                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37152 00004073 C3                              retn

 37155                                  ;
 37156                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37157                                  ;
 37158                                  ;   INPUT
 37159                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37160                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37161                                  ;
 37162                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37163                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37164                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37165                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37166                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37167                                  ;
 37168                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37169                                  ;       AX
 37170                                  ;
 37171                                  ;   NOTES
 37172                                  ;       None
 37173                                  ;
 37174                                  ;   HISTORY
 37175                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37176                                  ;
 37177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37178                                  
 37179                                  ; 13/05/2019

 37181                                  get_number:
 37182 00004074 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37183                                  num_loop:
 37184 00004076 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37185 00004079 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37186 0000407B 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37187 0000407D 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37188 0000407F 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37189 00004081 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37190 00004083 50                              push    ax              ;
 37191 00004084 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37192 00004087 52                              push    dx              ;
 37193 00004088 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37194 0000408A 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37195 0000408B 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37196 0000408D 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37197 0000408E 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37198 00004090 98                              cbw                     ;
 37199 00004091 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37200 00004093 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37201                                  
 37202                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37203                                  ;num_done:
 37204                                          ;retn

 37206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37207                                  ;
 37208                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37209                                  ;
 37210                                  ;   INPUT
 37211                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37212                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37213                                  ;
 37214                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37215                                  ;       AL == next character
 37216                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37217                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37218                                  ;
 37219                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37220                                  ;       AX
 37221                                  ;
 37222                                  ;   NOTES
 37223                                  ;       None
 37224                                  ;
 37225                                  ;   HISTORY
 37226                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37227                                  ;
 37228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37229                                  
 37230                                  get_char:
 37231 00004095 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37232 00004098 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37233                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37234 0000409A 26                      	es	
 37235 0000409B AC                      	lodsb
 37236 0000409C 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37237 0000409E C3                              retn			;
 37238                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37239 0000409F B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37240                                  nearby_ret:
 37241 000040A2 C3                              retn

 37244                                  ;
 37245                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37246                                  ;
 37247                                  ;   INPUT
 37248                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37249                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37250                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37251                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37252                                  ;
 37253                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37254                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37255                                  ;
 37256                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37257                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37258                                  ;
 37259                                  ;   NOTES
 37260                                  ;       None
 37261                                  ;
 37262                                  ;   HISTORY
 37263                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37264                                  ;
 37265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37266                                  
 37267                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37268                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37269                                  
 37270                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37271                                  query_user:
 37272 000040A3 F606[0D47]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37273                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37274 000040A8 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37275 000040AA E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37276                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37277                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37278                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37279                                  qu_1:
 37280 000040AD F606[0D47]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37281 000040B2 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37282 000040B4 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37283 000040B5 A0[BE14]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37284 000040B8 F606[0D47]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37285 000040BD 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37286 000040BF A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37287                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37288 000040C1 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37289                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37290                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37291                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37292                                  
 37293                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37294 000040C3 58                      	pop	ax
 37295 000040C4 C3                      	retn

 37297                                  query_all:
 37298                                  
 37299                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37300                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37301                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37302                                  
 37303 000040C5 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37304 000040C6 BA[1A4D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37305 000040C9 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37306 000040CB 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37307                                  
 37308 000040CD 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37309 000040CF 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37310 000040D1 BF[5A47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37311                                  find_match:                             ;
 37312 000040D4 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37313 000040D6 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37314 000040D8 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37315 000040DA 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37316 000040DB 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37317 000040DD 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37318 000040DF 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37319                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37320 000040E2 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37321                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37322 000040E4 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37323 000040E7 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37324 000040E9 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37325                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37326 000040EB 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37327 000040ED 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37328 000040EE 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37329 000040F0 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37330 000040F2 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37331 000040F4 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37332 000040F6 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37333 000040F9 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37334 000040FB B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37335                                  cmd_notset:
 37336 000040FD CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37337                                  line_print:                             ;
 37338                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37339 000040FF 26                              es
 37340 00004100 AC                      	lodsb
 37341 00004101 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37342 00004103 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37343 00004105 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37344                                  non_null:                               ;
 37345 00004107 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37346 00004109 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37347 0000410B 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37348                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37349 0000410D 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37350                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37351 00004110 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37352                                  non_space:                              ;
 37353 00004112 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37354 00004114 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37355 00004116 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37356 00004118 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37357                                  
 37358                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37359 0000411A BA[B84C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37360                                  
 37361                                  generic_prompt:
 37362 0000411D E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37363                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37364 00004120 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37365 00004122 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37366 00004124 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37367 00004126 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37368 00004128 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37369 0000412B 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37370 0000412D A0[C44C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 37371 00004130 800E[0D47]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37372 00004135 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37373                                  not_func:
 37374 00004137 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37375 00004139 3A06[C44C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37376 0000413D 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37377 0000413F 3A06[C04C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37378 00004143 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37379 00004145 803E[BE14]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37380 0000414A 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37381 0000414C 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37382 0000414E 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37383 00004150 800E[0D47]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37384 00004155 A0[C04C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37385                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37386 00004158 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37387 0000415B 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37388                                  
 37389 0000415C 3A06[C44C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37390 00004160 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37391                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37392 00004162 F8                      	clc
 37393                                  do_cmd:
 37394 00004163 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37395                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37396                                  	; cf=0
 37397                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37398 00004164 C3                      	retn
 37399                                  
 37400                                  skip_cmd:
 37401 00004165 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37402                                  skip_all:
 37403 00004166 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37404 00004168 F9                      	stc
 37405 00004169 C3                      	retn

 37462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37463                                  
 37464                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37465                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37466                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37467                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37468                                  
 37469                                  disable_autoexec:
 37470                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37471                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37472                                  
 37473 0000419E F606[0D47]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37474 000041A3 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37475 000041A5 F606[0347]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37476 000041AA 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37477 000041AC 800E[0347]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37478                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37479 000041B1 810E[0D47]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37480 000041B7 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37481                                  dae_1:
 37482                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37483 000041BA A0[4246]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37484                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37485 000041BD 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37486 000041BF 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37487 000041C1 8A1E[4346]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37488 000041C5 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37489 000041C7 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37490 000041C9 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37491 000041CC 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37492 000041CF 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 37493 000041D1 881E[4346]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length

 37649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37650                                  
 37651                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 37658 0000424F 1E                      	push	ds
 37659                                  
 37660 00004250 06                      	push	es
 37661 00004251 1F                      	pop	ds
 37662                                  
 37663                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37664                                  
 37665                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37666                                  
 37667                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37668 00004252 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 37669                                  ;else
 37670                                  ;	xor	si,si
 37671                                  ;endif
 37672                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37673                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37674                                  	;xor	si, si
 37675                                  
 37676                                  convloop:
 37677 00004254 AC                      	lodsb
 37678 00004255 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37679 00004257 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37680 00004259 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37681 0000425B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37682 0000425D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37683 0000425F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37684                                  noconv:
 37685                                  
 37686                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37687                                  
 37688                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 37689                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37690                                  
 37691                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37692                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37693                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37694                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37695                                  ;
 37696 00004262 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37697 00004265 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37698 00004267 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37699 00004269 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes

 37705                                  ;endif

 37828                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37829                                  ;
 37830                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37831                                  ;
 37832                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37833                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37834                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37835                                  ;
 37836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37837                                  
 37838                                  getnum:
 37839 000042EC 53                      	push	bx
 37840 000042ED 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37841                                  b2:
 37842 000042EF E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37843 000042F2 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37844                                  
 37845 000042F4 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37846 000042F5 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37847                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37848                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37849 000042F6 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37850 000042F8 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37851 000042FA 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37852 000042FB 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37853 000042FD 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37854 00004300 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37855                                  
 37856 00004302 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37857                                  
 37858 00004303 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 37859 00004306 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37860 00004308 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37861 0000430A 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37862 0000430C 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37863 0000430E 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37864 00004310 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37865 00004312 7417                    	je	short b15
 37866 00004314 2E3A06[AC02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37867 00004319 7410                    	je	short b15
 37868 0000431B 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37869                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37870                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37871                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37872                                  	;nop
 37873 0000431D 740C                    	je	short b15
 37874 0000431F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37875 00004321 7408                    	je	short b15
 37876 00004323 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37877 00004325 7404                    	je	short b15
 37878 00004327 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37879 00004329 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37880                                  b15:
 37881 0000432B 2EFF06[5403]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37882 00004330 2EFF0E[5803]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37883                                  b1:
 37884 00004335 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37885 00004337 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37886 00004339 5B                      	pop	bx
 37887 0000433A C3                      	retn
 37888                                  badnum:
 37889                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37890                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37891 0000433B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37892                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37893 0000433D 2EA2[AC02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37894 00004341 5B                      	pop	bx
 37895 00004342 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37896 00004343 C3                      	retn
 37897                                  
 37898                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37899                                  
 37900                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37901                                  
 37902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37903                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37904                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37905                                  ;	si = 0
 37906                                  ;	ax = country id
 37907                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37908                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37909                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37910                                  ;
 37911                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37912                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37913                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37914                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37916                                  
 37917                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37918                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 37919                                  
 37920                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37921                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 37922                                  
 37923 00004344 57                      	push	di
 37924 00004345 50                      	push	ax
 37925 00004346 52                      	push	dx
 37926                                  
 37927 00004347 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37928 00004349 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37929 0000434B B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37930 0000434E E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37931 00004351 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37932                                  
 37933 00004353 06                      	push	es
 37934 00004354 56                      	push	si
 37935                                  
 37936 00004355 0E                      	push	cs
 37937 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 37938                                  
 37939 00004357 BF[A845]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37940 0000435A B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37941 0000435D F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37942                                  
 37943 0000435F 5E                      	pop	si
 37944 00004360 07                      	pop	es
 37945 00004361 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37946                                  
 37947 00004363 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37948 00004366 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37949 00004369 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37950                                  
 37951 0000436B 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37952 0000436C 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37953 0000436E 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37954 00004371 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37955 00004374 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37956 00004377 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37957                                  
 37958 00004379 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37959 0000437B 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37960 0000437F 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37961                                  
 37962 00004381 46                      	inc	si
 37963 00004382 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37964 00004383 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37965 00004384 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37966 00004385 5F                      	pop	di
 37967                                  
 37968                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37969 00004386 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37970 00004389 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37971                                  
 37972                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37973                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37974                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37975 0000438B 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 37976 0000438D 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 37977 0000438F 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37978 00004392 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37979                                  
 37980                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37981 00004394 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37982 00004396 46                      	inc	si
 37983 00004397 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37984 00004398 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37985                                  
 37986                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37987                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37988 0000439A 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 37989                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37990 0000439B F9                      	stc
 37991 0000439C C3                      	retn
 37992                                  
 37993                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37994 0000439D 5E                      	pop	si
 37995 0000439E 59                      	pop	cx
 37996 0000439F 5F                      	pop	di
 37997 000043A0 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37998                                  
 37999                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38000 000043A2 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38001                                  
 38002                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry

 38163                                  getcountrydestination:
 38164                                  
 38165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38166                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38167                                  ;
 38168                                  ;input: al - data id
 38169                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38170                                  ;on return:
 38171                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38172                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38173                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38174                                  
 38175                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38176                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38177                                  
 38178                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38179                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38180                                  
 38181 00004469 51                      	push	cx
 38182                                  	;add	di,74
 38183 0000446A 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38184                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38185 0000446D 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38186 00004470 47                      	inc	di
 38187 00004471 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38188                                  
 38189                                  getcntrydest:
 38190 00004472 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38191 00004475 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38192                                  
 38193 00004477 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38194 0000447B 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38195                                  
 38196 0000447D 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38197 00004480 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38198                                  
 38199                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38200                                  	;add	di,41
 38201 00004482 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38202                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38203 00004485 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38204 00004487 F9                      	stc
 38205                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38206                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38207                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38208 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 38209 00004489 C3                      	retn
 38210                                  
 38211                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38212                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38213 0000448A 47                      	inc	di
 38214                                  
 38215                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38216                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 38217                                  ;
 38218                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 38219                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38220                                  
 38221                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38222 0000448B 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38223 0000448D 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 38224                                  
 38225                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38226                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38227                                  	; 10/09/2023

 38229                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 38230 00004492 59                      	pop	cx
 38231 00004493 C3                      	retn
 38232                                  
 38233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38234                                  
 38235                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38236                                  
 38237                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38238                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38239                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38240                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38241                                  ;
 38242                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38243                                  ;	 be moved.
 38244                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38245                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38246                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38247                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38248                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38249                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38251                                  
 38252 00004494 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38253 00004495 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38254 00004498 F9                      	stc
 38255 00004499 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38256 0000449B 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38257 0000449C 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38258                                  
 38259 0000449E 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38260 000044A0 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38261 000044A2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38262 000044A4 F9                      	stc
 38263 000044A5 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38264                                  ricb_exit:
 38265 000044A7 C3                      	retn
 38266

 38269                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38270                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38271                                  %if 0
 38272                                  
 38273                                  set_country_path:
 38274                                  
 38275                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38276                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38277                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38278                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38279                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38280                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38281                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38283                                  
 38284                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38285                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38286                                  
 38287                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38288                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38289                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38290                                  
 38291                                  	push	si
 38292                                  
 38293                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38294                                  	push	es
 38295                                  	pop	ds
 38296                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38297                                  
 38298                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38299                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38300                                  
 38301                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38302                                  	inc	si
 38303                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38304                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38305                                  
 38306                                  scp_default_drv:
 38307                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38308                                  	int	21h
 38309                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38310                                  
 38311                                  scp_setdrv:
 38312                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38313                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38314                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38315                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38316                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38317                                  
 38318                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38319                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38320                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38321                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38322                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38323                                  
 38324                                  scp_root_dir:
 38325                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38326                                  scp_path:
 38327                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38328                                  
 38329                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38330                                  scpath_exit:
 38331                                  
 38332                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38333                                  	push	es
 38334                                  	pop	ds
 38335                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38336                                  
 38337                                  	pop	si
 38338                                  	retn
 38339                                  
 38340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38341                                  
 38342                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38343                                  
 38344                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38345                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38346                                  ;carry set if not.
 38347                                  
 38348                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38349                                  
 38350                                  	push	ax
 38351                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38352                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38353                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38354                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38355                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38356                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38357                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38358                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38359                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38360                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38361                                  
 38362                                  cdletter_no:
 38363                                  	stc
 38364                                  cdletter_exit:
 38365                                  	pop	ax
 38366                                  	retn
 38367                                  
 38368                                  %endif
